0831180407001436--.name: In the northern parts of the city, you'll find the royal office and library. $map:02000031$ is a must-see for any book lover, of course. It's not the biggest library in Maple World, but I like to think that it's the best. When I'm off-duty, I love to wander the stacks.

0831180407001437--.name: Behind the library is a shopping district where you can find special items, anything from home decor to mounts.

0831180407001438--.name: To the southwest, you'll find shops that sell equipment and other supplies. $npcName:11000004[gender:0]$ is one of the best smiths in the land, and $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ sells all the latest herbs and potions. Never pick a fight without a stack of potions, I always say.

0831180407001439--.name: Head southeast and you'll find the residential district and hospital. Kick your feet up and relax after a long journey at $map:02000033$. Have your ailments treated by Tria's finest physician at $map:02000125$. And there's nothing $npcName:11000038[gender:0]$ can't cure.

0831180407001440--.name: And that's $map:02000001$ in a nutshell. A long, wordy nutshell. If I told you everything about the city, you'd be here all night. Is there anything else you want to know?

0831180407001441--.name: I know that you probably came from very far away to see the empress, but these things can't be helped. Thank you for understanding that we had to cancel the open court in the face of unexpected disaster.

0831180407001442--.name: $map:02000001$ is the political, economic, and cultural heart of Maple World, so it's always crowded. But in preparation for open court, there must have been ten times the normal number of people here.

0831180407001443--.name: Of course, when you have so many people in one place, problems are certain to crop up. Thieves, con artists, and the incident at the celebra—Oops. Maybe I shouldn't have said that.

0831180407001444--.name: Anyway, Captain $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ is determined to keep the peace. Enjoy your stay here, and stay out of trouble. For your own sake.

0831180407001455--.name: Everyone in Maple World dreams of having a home to call their own. The empress and her court work tirelessly to open up new plots of land, but there's only so much space, so not many people can have the luxury of owning a magnicifent villa.

0831180407001456--.name: If you don't have a house yet, you should consider $map:02000001$. Property in the city proper is expensive, but the outlying suburb of $map:02000002$ is partially subsidized by the empress. And there's always $map:02000119$... And $map:02000064$...

0831180407001457--.name: There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling $map:02000092$.

0831180407001458--.name: And the merchants in $map:02000036$, west of $map:02000023$, have all kinds of interesting furnishings for sale. Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

0831180407001459--.name: If you already have a house, you could always hire an assistant or two to keep you company. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in the northwestern district of $map:02000001$ hires them out. But first thing's first. You have to buy a house before you can get an assistant!

0831180407001447--.name: Gosh, you're a Knight! I may be a humble guard now, but someday I want to be just like you.

0831180407001448--.name: You know, an old friend of mine left town to become a Berserker. I wonder how he's doing...

0831180407001449--.name: If you're a Wizard, then you'll want to visit $map:02000031$. Even the fairies of $map:02000023$ say our library is the best.

0831180407001450--.name: It is an honor to serve you, Priest. How is the empress doing?

0831180407001451--.name: You're a Green Hood, aren't you? That's great. We guard could use the support of people like you during these crazy times.

0831180407001452--.name: You're a Heavy Gunner, aren't you? I've always wanted to visit $map:2000270$.

0831180407001453--.name: We're watching you, Thief. You are a guest of the kingdom, but we won't abide any criminal activity.

0831180407001454--.name: Know this, Assassin. $map:02000001$ is a city of light.

0831180407001445--.name: If you're looking to take up a job, you should make a stop at the $map:02000188$ in the center of $map:02000001$. Job masters from all over the world are gathered there.

0831180407001446--.name: The timing is pretty lucky for you. If it weren't for the empress's court, they wouldn't be here. Of course, if you aren't at least level 10, they won't even talk to you.

0215111307005861--.name: They say Runeblades are masters of swordsmanship and magic. Being good at either one is hard enough... How did you manage to master both?

0601215907006324-Striker-.name: Hey, you're the Gray Wolf of $map:02000100$, aren't you? They say that you're a master martial artist and that you're taking the fight straight to the gangsters! A real champion of the people! You're my hero! Though... I thought you'd be taller.

0601215907006325-Striker-.name: You've mistaken me for someone else.

0601215907006326-Striker-.name: R-really? I'm sorry. I always wanted to meet $male:him,female:her$ in person. I guess I just got excited.

0806020907007129-SoulBinder-.name: Not many people know this, but there's a sect of animal people who live in the mountains and practice mysterious martial arts. I've heard legends that they can even bring the dead back to life...

0831180407001461--.name: How much longer will it take to finish my house?

0831180407001462--.name: I've been traveling all my life, and the greatest lesson I've learned is to never waste anything. $npcName:21000029$, for example, has hundreds of practical uses. It's amazing stuff!

0831180407001466--.name: You can't step on flowers like that! Don't lie to me, I saw you!

0831180407001468--.name: Being able to work is a blessing.

0831180407001469--.name: People shouldn't waste their lives being idle. Work is its own reward.

0831180407001470--.name: Our fuel needs are growing by the day. I think more excavation sites will be needed soon.

0831180407001471--.name: We're pumping oil every day. It's still kind of surprising how much we need to get by.

0831180407001474--.name: If only I could get out of here...!

0831180407001475--.name: Ah, I'm finally safe! You're my savior.

0831180407001476--.name: I thought I was going to die. I used to think I was untouchable. But after they took me so easily...

0831180407001477--.name: I can't believe you came to save me... Thank you. I'll live an honest life from now on. I'll donate to charities, pay all my taxes, and volunteer at the soup kitchens.

0831180407001480--.name: Woof! One day, a meteor fell from the sky. Be careful, it might have friends.

0831180407001482--.name: Get me out of here, woof!

0831180407001487--.name: I'm tired of doing bad things.

0831180407001488--.name: I'm a new man. From now on, I'm going to live an honest life. I'm leaving my days of being a thug behind.

0831180407001490--.name: I hope my son is doing well.

0831180407001491--.name: Are you traveling? You look like you're about my son's age.

0831180407001492--.name: $npcName:11000360[gender:0]$ is my only child. He left home recently, wanting to strike out on his own. If only he knew how much that hurt his mother.

0831180407001493--.name: The day before yesterday I got a letter from $npcName:11000360[gender:0]$. He must've written it somewhere around here... even the edges are singed. So I bought an ice pack to keep him cool.

0831180407001494--.name: My son, $npcName:11000360[gender:0]$ is on the other side of all that lava. I wanted to visit him, but I'm just too scared to cross it myself.

0831180407001495--.name: My son, $npcName:11000360[gender:0]$ is on the other side of all that lava. I wanted to visit him, but I'm just too scared to cross it myself.

0831180407001497--.name: It seems even the heat can't faze the twins.

0831180407001498--.name: Whew, it sure is hot here! I told my mom that I could make it on my own. Maybe I should've taken $npcName:11000420[gender:1]$'s advice and settled down in $map:02000111$ instead...

0831180407001499--.name: How may I help you today?

0831180407001501--.name: $npc:11000065[gender:0]$ is really amazing. When he sets his mind on something, nothing can stop him!

0831180407001503--.name: Fresh ingredients are the best ingredients!

0831180407001504--.name: People don't know how delicious $npcName:21000059$ can be.

0831180407001505--.name: Not many people know this, but cooked $npcName:21000059$ can be incredible. I'm getting ready to sell $npcName:21000059$ dishes made from my own secret recipe.

0831180407001510--.name: Shush! Please leave quietly. I'm done for if they find out I'm here.

0831180407001513--.name: Do you know what makes cats so appealing? It's how independent they are! Though... it's possible for them to be too independent. Like $npcName:11000367$, for example.

0831180407001516--.name: Do you believe in love at first sight, meow? I do! Look at the cat next to me. Isn't she beautiful? Me-ow!

0831180407001519--.name: $MyPCName$, you of all people should help protect the forest!

0831180407001527--.name: This is the power of science!

0831180407001528--.name: All research serves a vital purpose!

0831180407001529--.name: As scientists, we must always look toward the future. We must not abandon our research because we aren't happy with the immediate results, or out of fear of perceived consequences. Science requires persistence and dedication!

0831180407001531--.name: Why are you looking at me like that? Ha ha ha!

0831180407001532--.name: I saw you watching me earlier. You're barking up the wrong tree.

0831180407001533--.name: Don't you believe me? I have nothing to hide. Have you always been this nosey?

1215105107009707--.name: Today's such a beautiful day! Wouldn't you agree, friend?

1215105107009709--.name: We made eye contact just now, you can't deny it. That makes us pals! Nice to meet you, friend.

1215105107009710--.name: Uh, hey buddy. Have you heard the rumors going around?

1215105107009711--.name: I sure have. Look, I wouldn't go around blabbing this to just anybody, but we're friends, right?

1215105107009713--.name: So a while back, I was taking a walk. I like going on walks to clear my head. Of course it only works if I go alone. Anyway—

1215105107009714--.name: Can you fast-forward to the part where stuff happens?

1215105107009715--.name: Right, so I was taking a nice leisurely stroll through Middleton when a giant shadow appeared in the sky!

1215105107009716--.name: I still can't get the image out of my head... giant wings, and these terrible muscly bodies... It was a whole flock of demons! I was terrified.

1215105107009717--.name: Wait, then you're the one who started the rumor!

1215105107009718--.name: They're not rumors! It's all true! Would I lie to my best friend?! Besides, I took a picture. Look.

1215105107009719--.name: Could I keep this photo? Since we're such good friends.

1215105107009720--.name: Sure, if it means you believe me! Take it. I don't know what I'd do if my own friend didn't believe me.

0831180407001535--.name: I don't think I can hunt in peace anymore.

0831180407001536--.name: Not everyone can be a wolf handler.

0831180407001538--.name: So uh... are you a dude or a lady?

0831180407001540--.name: There are treasure chests hidden all over the world. How did they get there? Who knows and who cares! Just remember the golden rule: finders keepers!

0831180407001541--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180407001542--.name: When will I ever pass through this valley again?

0831180407001543--.name: Enoki mushrooms grow here. They require clean, undisturbed areas to flourish. I suppose no one ever comes to this valley, then.

0831180407001546--.name: One day, I'm going to soar!

0831180407001547--.name: Do you believe in aliens? I do! There has to be loads of intelligent creatures out there, the universe is huge! You should stop by some night and watch the stars with me.

0831180407001551--.name: Ahh, such a nice breeze! And the scenery is beautiful!

0831180407001552--.name: Heya! I'm $npcName:11000379[gender:0]$, and I'm a member of the Wall Climbers. We're a group of free-climbing enthusiasts who support each other on our quest to surmount the greatest of heights. Anyone with a passion for climbing is welcome.

0831180407001554--.name: I feel like a king surveying my domain!

0831180407001555--.name:
Well hey. My name's $npcName:11000380[gender:0]$, and I'm a member of the Wall Climbers. 
We're a group of free-climbing enthusiasts who support each other on our quest to surmount the greatest of heights. Anyone with a passion for climbing is welcome.

0831180407001558--.name: Hey there! My name is $npcName:11000381[gender:0]$, and I'm a member of the Wall Climbers. We're a group of free-climbing enthusiasts who support each other on our quest to surmount the greatest of heights. Anyone with a passion for climbing is welcome.

0831180407001561--.name: Hello. My name is $npcName:11000382[gender:0]$, and I'm a member of the Wall Climbers.  We're a group of free-climbing enthusiasts who support each other on our quest to surmount the greatest of heights. Anyone with a passion for climbing is welcome.

0831180407001563--.name: Tsk, tsk. You're quite foolish, child.

0831180407001564--.name: You're lucky I found you and that I'm a doctor. You could've been in big trouble. Stop being stupid, and listen to your parents!

0105003907007683-NPCPortal01-.name: Ugh... I'm feeling awful but still I have to work...

0831180407001570--.name: If you see trash on the street, by all means pick it up! Everyone has to do their part to keep their homes clean.

0831180407001573--.name: Hello. I am $npcName:11000386$. You seem surprised that I can talk. Don't be. Maple World is full of surprises after all.

0831180407001576--.name: Have you seen $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$? He's right over there... and he's sooooooo handsome. Ah, I wish I could get close to him...

0831180407001580--.name: The crowd's already whipped themselves into a frenzy. It's like this wherever we go. Hey you! Back up, buddy.

0831180407001584--.name: Since the big split, $map:2000115$ has been attracting all kinds of lookie-loos. And a true businessman never wastes a good opportunity like this!

0831180407001587--.name: We've been busy. People are still checking in, with no idea the empress's gathering has been canceled.

0831180407001588--.name: The empress is no longer holding court, but we're still booked up. I don't think most people have heard the news yet.

0831180407001590--.name: Did you hear the court was canceled?

0831180407001591--.name: Have you just arrived in $map:02000001$? I came here three days ago and I'm already sick of this city. What a waste.

0831180407001594--.name: Did you hear the court was canceled? I thought it would be a big to-do, so I arrived two weeks ago.

0831180407001595--.name: And now it's canceled! Argh, I stayed at the hotel for two weeks for nothing!

0831180407001596--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180407001597--.name: Should I just give up and go back?

0831180407001599--.name: When my manager is angry, he screams at the top of his lungs and throws anything he can get his hands on. No one can stop him. All you can do is avoid him.

0831180407001601--.name: This city is going to the dogs...

0831180407001602--.name: They say that old miser, $npcName:11000252[gender:0]$, is the worst... but they haven't met $npcName:11000491[gender:1]$!

0831180407001605--.name: Everyone here works hard, including me, but we can't ever seem to get ahead. It's sad, and I've heard $map:02000100$'s mayor is responsible for keeping us all poor.

0831180407001606--.name: Why me? What did I do?

0831180407001608--.name: Keep those thugs away from me...

0831180407001611--.name: Ah! The air is so much fresher up here!

0831180407001612--.name: It may not look it, but my house is the most expensive in the neighborhood. There's nothing quite like living up so high. I hope my daughter appreciates how hard it was for me to get this place for us.

0831180407001614--.name: Cough, cough... This smell is killing me!

0831180407001615--.name:
Cough, cough... I'm tired of living in this cesspit. 
I'm going to make it out of here one day! *Cough Cough*

0831180407001617--.name: Oh geez, this is disgusting! I wish I could cut off my nose.

0831180407001618--.name: The more I think about it, the angrier I get! How could they stop me from going on vacation, and one that I've had planned for months? Maybe I should just leave and let them deal with the water.

0831180407001620--.name: I have no idea what is happening... Sigh...

0831180407001621--.name: Dark Wind told me to take some time off, so I thought I'd take a vacation to the dam. Then I noticed that... thing... under the water. How am I supposed to rest now?

0831180407001622--.name: Dark Wind told me to take some time off, so I thought I'd take a vacation to the dam. Then I noticed that... thing... under the water. How am I supposed to rest now?

0831180407001624--.name: I should pack this. And this. Ooh, and that...

0831180407001625--.name: Please be very careful with this. It's one of my all-time favorite comic books.

0831180407001626--.name: $male:Mister,female:Lady$, do you like comic books? They're my favorite thing in the world. I want to be an illustrator when I grow up.

0831180407001629--.name: I need $item:20000060$ from $npcName:21000078$... to cleanse myself...

0831180407001630--.name: This toxin... stronger than I thought...

0831180407001635--.name: I'll get my revenge no matter what!

0831180407001638--.name: $npcName:23000024[gender:1]$ carries a dark power. Try not to get poisoned.

0831180407001639--.name: Some folks think I must be a blacksmith. But not all yetis are smiths, you know! So stop trying to buy my stuff.

0831180407001640--.name: This is the Dark Wind Bulletin Board.

0831180407001641--.name:
Eliminate $npcName:29000023$ and bring me proof for your reward.

- Captain $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$

0831180407001643--.name: You don't have to look twice. I'm who you think I am.

0831180407001644--.name: Sometimes I'm afraid to look in the mirror.

0831180407001646--.name: I might fall in love with myself!

0831180407001647--.name: But I'm already in love with you!

0831180407001648--.name: I'm just gonna pretend I didn't hear that.

0831180407001649--.name: I know how difficult it is to resist my incredible charms. Don't hate me because I can't love you in return.

0831180407001650--.name: Hey, hey! What are you looking at? Look at me! Hello! Hey, can't you hear me?

0831180407001651--.name: What do you want to know?

0831180407001652--.name: You're being very attentive. I'm glad I'm not boring you. Is there anything else you want to hear?

0831180407001653--.name: Actually, I'd better be on my way.

0831180407001655--.name: Tell me about what's going on now.

0831180407001656--.name: I didn't know it was getting so late. The forest trail has been fraught with mushrooms and pigs. Please be safe.

0831180407001657--.name: Another old story? What kind of story?

0831180407001658--.name: Tell me about the sages and the Lapenta.

0831180407001659--.name: Tell me about $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ and the heroes.

0831180407001660--.name: Tell me about the Demon King and the power of darkness.

0831180407001661--.name: I'm not that interested in old stories, honestly.

0831180407001700--.name: About the present, eh? All right, what do you want to know?

0831180407001701--.name: Tell me all about Maple World.

0831180407001702--.name: Tell me of the Shadow World.

0831180407001703--.name: I don't feel like stories about the present right now.

0831180407001662--.name: This world wouldn't have existed if it weren't for the sages and the Lapenta. Which story do you want to hear first?

0831180407001665--.name: How about a different old story?

0831180407001666--.name: Originally, each of the three sages was responsible for one aspect of the world. They governed life, space, and time to ensure the world remained in balance. Then one day...

0831180407001667--.name: The Demon King emerged, intent on destroying the balance between the three fundamental powers. He wanted to overtake the world with his own dark powers, turning it to a realm of endless chaos and despair.

0831180407001668--.name: The Demon King was strong enough to match the combined powers of the sages. To defeat him, the sages were forced to sacrifice themselves to banish the Demon King. Their legacy lives on in the Lapentas which contain what's left of their powers. Now do you understand why the sages were so important?

0831180407001670--.name: The Lapentas were created by the sages to protect this world from the Demon King. They gave their lives to grant us these powerful gifts.

0831180407001671--.name: The Green Lapenta  keeps the balance of life, the Blue Lapenta governs space, and the Red Lapenta maintains time.

0831180407001672--.name: These three Lapentas have formed a protective ward around this world, keeping the formidable Demon King and his dark power at bay. Hopefully that explains why the Lapentas are so important.

0831180407001674--.name: $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ and the Four Heroes helped the sages protect this world against the Demon King. Whose story do you want to hear first?

0831180407001677--.name: How about a different old story?

0831180407001678--.name: There has been an empress born to each generation of humans, destined to deliver the will of the divine as their messenger.

0831180407001679--.name: The empresses are selected by the will of the divine. The $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ was chosen a long time ago and inherited the title from her predecessor.

0831180407001680--.name: After the three sages perished and left behind the Lapentas, the $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ became the spiritual leader of Maple World. She was instrumental in rebuilding society after the Demon King nearly destroyed everything.

0831180407001681--.name: In the early stages of Maple World's reconstruction, the $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ would hold open courts to allow the people to speak to her. In time, however, she ceased this practice.

0831180407001682--.name: There has been much speculation over why she stopped holding court. Some said the $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ was struck down by illness. Others said she was abducted by the reawakened Demon King.

0831180407001683--.name: Whatever the case may be, the empress never lost the love and respect of her people. These rumors only show how concerned they are for her well-being. Do you understand the importance of $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ now?

0831180407001685--.name: The Four Heroes are gone now, but their legend will live on. It is rare to find someone who does not know their names.

0831180407001686--.name: There was the mysterious mage Lewit from Ellin Forest, hot-headed warrior Ten from the holy Vayar Mountains, righteous archer Haster from the Green Meadows, and carefree thief Catarva from Kerningdom.

0831180407001687--.name: The warrior Ten fell in battle against the Demon King himself. The other three heroes were asked by the $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ to protect the Lapentas, rather than sacrifice themselves.

0831180407001688--.name: The mage Lewit was entrusted with the Green Lapenta of Life. He hid it in the depths of the Ellin Forest for safekeeping.

0831180407001689--.name: Archer Haster was entrusted with the Red Lapenta of Time. He hid it somewhere in the Green Meadows.

0831180407001690--.name: Thief Catarva was entrusted with the Blue Lapenta of Space. He hid it in a secret alcove within Kerningdom.

0831180407001691--.name: The three surviving heroes became the first guardians of the Lapentas and dedicated themselves to the task for the rest of their lives. And now you know the story of the Four Heroes, yes?

0831180407001693--.name: Not much is known about the Demon King. He was powerful enough to bring Maple World to its knees, and no one who challenged him lived to tell about it.

0831180407001694--.name: No one knows where he came from, how he came to be, or what made him so powerful.

0831180407001695--.name: What everyone DOES know is that the Demon King hails from a world of death, despair, and fear, permeated by the power of darkness that he wields so brutally.

0831180407001696--.name: People named this dark world the Shadow World, and despaired when they found that even the Lapentas themselves could not purge the darkness.

0831180407001697--.name: So long as the protective ward of the Lapentas lasts, Maple World will be safe. But there is always the fear that the Shadow World will find new ways into our world, and destroy it.

0831180407001698--.name: So, somewhere beyond the reaches of our peaceful, idyllic Maple World lies a realm of pure darkness and terror that seeks to destroy us all. Does that answer your question?

0831180407001704--.name: Maple World is a collection of continents floating in a vast, endless ocean. The biggest continent of all is Victoria Island.

0831180407001705--.name: Victoria Island consists of the capital city of $map:02000001$, where $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$</font>'s palace stands, $map:02000076$, $map:02000023$, $map:02000051$, and $map:02000100$. Each of these areas has developed its own unique culture.

0831180407001706--.name: Among them, $map:02000001$ is a metropolis built around the $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$'s palace and protected by massive castle walls. It's the political, economic, and cultural center of Maple World.

0831180407001707--.name: $map:02000076$ was once a quiet hamlet on an empty prairie. Then a group of bow craftsmen joined it and made it thrive among hunters and adventurers. Its elder is called... $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$, I think. I've heard he's a respectable fellow.

0831180407001708--.name: $map:02000023$ started out as a village of fairies in the depths of the Ellin Forest. After ages of hiding from the greater world, they have consented to allowing humans to visit them.

0831180407001709--.name: $map:02000051$ is situated on the far side of the treacherous Vayar Mountains. Rugged descendants of powerful tribes live on those rocky cliffs, and only the hardiest travelers can make it up there to pay them a visit.

0831180407001710--.name: $map:02000100$ was created by the Kerning workers who stay cooped up inside their bunkers, inventing things and studying crafting skills. Even I haven't been down there yet, but I've heard their technology is astonishing.

0831180407001711--.name: In my time, a great many young people left their homes on Maple Island and traveled across the vast oceans, dreaming of adventures and new challenges that awaited them on Victoria Island. I don't know if that's still the popular thing to do... Come to think of it, I haven't left this cabin for a long time.

0831180407001712--.name: Perhaps, instead of listening to this old man prattle on, you should venture forth and learn about this world for yourself. But for now, is there another story you want to hear?

0831180407001714--.name: The Shadow World is a world of death, despair, and fear, created by the Demon King. The only thing keeping him and his darkness from spilling into Maple World is the Lapentas, the legacy of the sages.

0831180407001715--.name: After the sages perished, their Lapentas formed a protective ward around this world which keeps the Shadow World at bay.

0831180407001716--.name: However, some ten years ago, the Blue Lapenta of Space broke. That lifted the seal on the Land of Darkness, and allowed a gateway to the Shadow World to open.

0831180407001717--.name: It is believe that this tragedy occurred because a servant of the Demon King tricked a protector of the Lapenta.

0831180407001718--.name: Fortunately, we still have the other two Lapentas hidden away somewhere in Maple World. So long as they persist, the ward will keep us safe from evil.

0831180407001719--.name: The army is doing everything they can to prevent the darkness infecting the Land of Darkness and Shadow World from spreading, but...

0831180407001720--.name: Perhaps what the $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ needs are great heroes who can preserve what peace we have.

0831180407001721--.name: I don't know if there are people strong enough to protect the $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$, the Lapentas, and this world against the Demon King and his darkness, though. Anyway, is there another story do you want to hear?

0831180407001724--.name: Ah-choo! I hate... pollen... ah-choo! It's terrib... ah-choo!

0831180407001725--.name: Please... I need to stop... ah-choo! I need to stop sneezing... Bring me $item:30000125$... ah-choo! The wildflowers over there. Sniff... You can pick up $item:30000125$ with the Z key.

0831180407001727--.name: You can pick up honey from the ground with the Z key... ah-choo!

0831180407001729--.name: The forest trail is too dangerous. We have to make it safe again, as soon as possible.

0831180407001730--.name: $npcName:99000041$ are making this trail too dangerous to travel.

0831180407001732--.name: I hope we can clean up this forest trail once more...

0831180407001733--.name: This forest trail is the only path connecting us to $npcName:11000407[gender:0]$, and the monsters are making it unusable. $npcName:11000409[gender:0]$ and I are working to clear them out.

0831180407001735--.name: These spray cans are how I express myself.

0831180407001736--.name: You ask me, tagging is just as much art as sick beats and hot moves. Some people say I'm just some punk, but they don't know what they're talking about.

0831180407001739--.name: Sup, man? You wanna talk art? What do you think is the soul of art?

0831180407001744--.name: Then lemme educate you, man! A real artist uses their tools to show the world their heart. That's the whole point, yo!

0831180407001745--.name: That's right! You're on point today!

0831180407001746--.name: Talent? Man, anyone can train up talent. That's not what's important.

0831180407001747--.name: Seriously? Man, I don't want to talk to you anymore.

0831180407001750--.name: Do you want to know my beauty secret?

0831180407001752--.name: Someone, please make these turtles go away.

0831180407001754--.name: Are you sightseeing? Head north to the condominium complex. The staff is nice, and it's really pretty around there. Just sayin'.

0831180407001758--.name: Well $MyPCName$, you're more health-conscious than I thought. Fish is an excellent source of protein and other essential nutrients.

0831180407001759--.name: Oh, you should eat fish regularly. I thought you knew that, $MyPCName$. Do you only eat red meat? It's too fatty. Eating fish helps you lose weight.

0831180407001761--.name: Sigh... I haven't had any customers lately.

0831180407001762--.name: I came here with my daughter $npcName:11000420[gender:1]$ to start a new life. But if those turtles don't stop showing up, we'll have to move again.

0831180407001763--.name: <font color="#909090">(The headstone is old and worn, and there is an epitaph inscribed upon it.)</font>

0831180407001764--.name: Here lies Roanna Levematri. She leaves behind her lover Alberto, whose heart will never heal.

0831180407001765--.name: Here lies Roanna Levematri. She leaves behind her lover Alberto, whose heart will never heal.

0831180407001768--.name: Have you seen a lost girl on the street?

0831180407001770--.name: She's so pretty! She looks like a doll.

0831180407001771--.name: Have you seen a lost, crying girl on the street? She's carrying a doll in her arms like it's a real baby.

0831180407001773--.name: I'd love to ride a $npcName:11000423$, but...

0831180407001774--.name: These vultures are not tamed. What if they fly me to some unfamiliar place or drop me in midair?

0831180407001776--.name: Ahh, I want to go home.

0831180407001778--.name: What have I gotten myself into? I should never have followed $npcName:11000425[gender:0]$ here. What's going on? And why's it snowing?

0105003907007684-NPCPortal01-.name: I'll let you head wherever you want right away. Just give me a moment.

0831180407001780--.name: I shall train these vultures well.

0831180407001781--.name: Mature $npcName:11000423$s are almost impossible to train. The best time to train them is right after they're born. If only $npcName:23000019[gender:0]$ didn't keep interfering, I could train up a new group of chicks...

0831180407001783--.name: To us adventurers, pain means we're alive!

0831180407001784--.name: A true adventurer dives head-first into trouble! He's not afraid of jumping off a cliff into a sea of lava or fighting giant, rampaging monsters!

0831180407001785--.name: Ah, the smell of the sea!

0831180407001786--.name: I haven't had time to myself like this for a long time!

0831180407001787--.name: I just ate lunch, and I'm already hungry.

0831180407001790--.name: $itemPlural:30000140$? That sounds delicious! I'll be back for those.

0831180407001791--.name: I'm so glad I decided to come to the beach.

0831180407001792--.name: Ah, I love the sound of the crashing waves.

0831180407001793--.name: $map:02000111$ is such a beautiful place to be! Except for the turtles. They're awful.

0831180407001797--.name: I'd better rest while I can!

0831180407001798--.name: The beach is the best place to get away from it all!

0831180407001799--.name: I've heard stories of treasure chests under the sea, but I've never seen one. How about you, $MyPCName$?

0831180407001804--.name: I came here to rest. Stop bothering me.

0831180407001810--.name: It's beautiful here, isn't it? Welcome to $map:02000076$!

0831180407001811--.name: I've been ordered not to let any shady types in.

0831180407001812--.name: I want to protect the peace of $map:02000076$ and all of Maple World.

0831180407001813--.name: I hope I'll make lots of new allies.

0831180407001814--.name: Welcome to $map:02000076$. How may I help you?

0831180407001816--.name: What happened to the empress's celebration?

0831180407001817--.name: Hey there. I'm new in town.

0831180407001819--.name: $map:02000076$ used to be the home of archers and craftsmen, all living in a collective. They produced many great works and great hunters, generation after generation.

0831180407001820--.name: The Green Hoods formed to protect the village from outside threats to their peace. Their current leader is their fifth, $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$.

0831180407001821--.name: Is $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ the chief of this village? Ha ha, no. The chief of $map:02000076$ is $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$. $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$'s father and $npc:11000001[gender:0]$ have been best friends since they were young.

0831180407001822--.name: That's why $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ takes care of $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ like his own. You know, $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ doesn't like people talking about her. So, maybe don't tell her about this conversation?

0831180407001823--.name: I've heard a great earthquake occurred near $map:02000001$, and the empress's court was canceled as a result. I hope the damage isn't too serious. That disaster might also keep $npcName:11000045[gender:0]$ from returning anytime soon.

0831180407001824--.name: $npcName:11000045[gender:0]$ won't tolerate anyone trying to take advantage of a chaotic situation. I hope he'll be back soon. We need him more than ever.

0831180407001825--.name: You've probably noticed that the Green Hoods are all archers. We're renowned throughout Victoria Island for our marksmanship, and even $npcName:11000045[gender:0]$, the master archer of $map:02000001$, is a Green Hood.

0831180407001826--.name: In fact, she taught me everything I know about loosing a bow. If you're interested in archery yourself, I'd suggest paying her a visit next time you're in the capital.

0831180407001827--.name: Everyone in Maple World dreams of having a house of their own. $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ is doing what he can to manage the housing lots around the village, but there's only so much land.

0831180407001828--.name: If you don't have a house yet, you could settle down in $map:02000076$. $map:02000105$ is also quite nice, and is famous for its beautiful maple trees. There might be some empty lots still available in $map:02000104$ or $map:02000143$ as well. If you're looking for more affordable options, then you can check out the apartments in $map:02000105$ or $map:02000104$.

0831180407001829--.name: There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling the ant tunnels.

0831180407001830--.name: And the merchants in $map:02000036$, west of $map:02000023$, have all kinds of interesting furnishings for sale. Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

0831180407001831--.name: If you already have a house, hiring a maid is a good next step. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in $map:02000001$ is an expert on assistants and can definitely help you out. Maybe you should look for a house around $map:02000076$ first.

0831180407001834--.name: You'd better not cause any trouble here, or you'll be sorry.

0831180407001835--.name: Don't write us off as government goons.

0831180407001839--.name: What happened to the empress's celebration?

0831180407001840--.name: Hey there. I'm new in town.

0831180407001842--.name: $map:02000100$ used to be a village of inventors and engineers who worked out of bunkers. It was a center of research and discovery.

0831180407001843--.name: Their achievements gave rise to the modern, high-tech metropolis that is $map:02000100$. But where are those engineers and inventors now? That question keeps me up at night.

0831180407001844--.name: Anyway, security in $map:02000100$ is handled by us Dark Wind scouts. Losing Winn Stilton was a big blow to the group, but we were able to reunite under the great leadership of our current captain, $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$.

0831180407001845--.name: The current mayor of $map:02000100$ is Mr. $npcName:11000065[gender:0]$. Word is that $npcName:11000252[gender:0]$, the wealthiest man in the city, has the mayor in his pocket. Of course, there are always going to be rumors like that floating around.

0831180407001846--.name: I've heard the court was canceled because of the great earthquake that hit $map:02000001$. It might be a good thing, honestly. The poor people in $map:02000100$ have been upset about the widening gap between them and the rich. Not having the money to attend the court was like salting the wound.

0831180407001847--.name: But it also worries me. What if the people decide to rise in rebellion, now that the highly-anticipated court was canceled and their beloved $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ is nowhere to be seen? As part of Dark Wind, I feel more responsible for this city now than ever.

0831180407001848--.name: You ever visit $map:02000001$? Major players from the backstreets of $map:02000100$ have decided to meet there and recruit new members. Assassin Master $npcName:11000051[gender:1]$ should be there too.

0831180407001849--.name: The timing is pretty lucky for you. If it weren't for the empress's court, they wouldn't be there. Of course, if you aren't at least level 10, they won't even talk to you.

0831180407001850--.name: Everyone in Maple World dreams of a house of their own. There are many houses in this city, and plenty of people who want them. If you don't have a house yet, how'd you like to settle down in $map:02000100$?

0831180407001851--.name: North of $map:02000100$ is $map:02000166$, the site of some booming new developments. Recently renovated, $map:02000165$ and $map:02000167$ are often mentioned as hot properties. There are also low-priced apartment complexes in $map:02000164$, west of $map:02000100$.

0831180407001852--.name: There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling $map:02000146$.

0831180407001853--.name: And the merchants in $map:02000036$, west of $map:02000023$, have all kinds of interesting furnishings for sale. Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

0831180407001854--.name: If you already have a house, hiring a maid is a good next step. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in $map:02000001$ is an expert on assistants and can definitely help you out. Maybe you should look for a house around $map:02000100$ first.

0831180407001855--.name: Captain $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$... No, he's not my captain anymore. This is all too much. What's going to happen to Dark Wind now?

0831180407001858--.name: The game will begin shortly. Places, people!

0831180407001861--.name: I don't want to talk. I got ripped off by my boss, and then I almost got killed by robbers. My life sucks!

0831180407001862--.name: Do you want to know what the owner of Cathy Mart is like? The worst, that's what!

0831180407001864--.name: Oh no. I left the cash in the registers!

0831180407001865--.name: If we don't get that money back, it's coming out of my paycheck...

0831180407001866--.name: I don't know who's worse, the boss or the robbers.

0831180407001867--.name: Ah... I want to get better soon, so I can go on adventures again.

0831180407001868--.name: I want to get better soon, so I can go on adventures again.

0831180407001870--.name: When can I sail again? Cough, cough! My leg had better heal quickly so I can get back to finding that pirate island.

0831180407001871--.name: The sea may look calm from here, but it can destroy you in an instant.

0831180407001881--.name: Get out of the way, I can't see $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$!

0831180407001887--.name: Welcome to $map:02000001$. How may I help you?

0831180407001889--.name: What happened to the empress's celebration?

0831180407001890--.name: Hey there. I'm new in town.

0831180407001892--.name: $map:02000001$ is the biggest city in all of Maple World and the seat of $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$'s power.

0831180407001893--.name: $map:02000025$ watches over the city from the north. It's off-limits to the public, I'm afraid. Her majesty's safety takes priority over the curiosity of tourists.

0831180407001894--.name: The $map:02000188$, the Banners of Glory, and a taxi stop are all conveniently located in the center of the city. For a reasonable fee, you can hire a taxi to take you to any other taxi stop you've visited, you know. Oh, and the job instructors from all over are gathered in the $map:02000188$.

0831180407001895--.name: The Banners of Glory in front of the palace mark the victories of certain powerful guilds and individuals. We update the banners all the time, so you can stop by whenever you like to see who has the most trophies and victories.

0831180407001896--.name: In the northern parts of the city, you'll find the royal office and library. $map:02000031$ is a must-see for any book lover, of course. It's not the biggest library in Maple World, but I like to think that it's the best. When I'm off-duty, I love to wander the stacks.

0831180407001897--.name: Behind the library is a shopping district where you can find special items, anything from home decor to mounts.

0831180407001898--.name: To the southwest, you'll find shops that sell equipment and other supplies. $npcName:11000004[gender:0]$ is one of the best smiths in the land, and $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ sells all the latest herbs and potions. Never pick a fight without a stack of potions, I always say.

0831180407001899--.name: Head southeast and you'll find the residential district and hospital. Kick your feet up and relax after a long journey at $map:02000033$. Have your ailments treated by Tria's finest physician at $map:02000125$. And there's nothing $npcName:11000038[gender:0]$ can't cure.

0831180407001900--.name: And that's $map:02000001$ in a nutshell. A long, wordy nutshell. If I told you everything about the city, you'd be here all night. Is there anything else you want to know?

0831180407001901--.name: I know that you probably came from very far away to see the empress, but these things can't be helped. Thank you for understanding that we had to cancel the open court in the face of unexpected disaster.

0831180407001902--.name: $map:02000001$ is the political, economic, and cultural heart of Maple World, so it's always crowded. But in preparation for open court, there must have been ten times the normal number of people here.

0831180407001903--.name: Of course, when you have so many people in one place, problems are certain to crop up. Thieves, con artists, and the incident at the celebra—Oops. Maybe I shouldn't have said that.

0831180407001904--.name: Anyway, Captain $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ is determined to keep the peace. Enjoy your stay here, and stay out of trouble. For your own sake.

0831180407001915--.name: Everyone in Maple World dreams of having a home to call their own. The empress and her court work tirelessly to open up new plots of land, but there's only so much space, so not many people can have the luxury of owning a magnicifent villa.

0831180407001916--.name: If you don't have a house yet, you should consider $map:02000001$. Property in the city proper is expensive, but the outlying suburb of $map:02000002$ is partially subsidized by the empress. And there's always $map:02000119$... And $map:02000064$...

0831180407001917--.name: There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling $map:02000092$.

0831180407001918--.name: And the merchants in $map:02000036$, west of $map:02000023$, have all kinds of interesting furnishings for sale. Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

0831180407001919--.name: If you already have a house, you could always hire an assistant or two to keep you company. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in the northwestern district of $map:02000001$ hires them out. But first thing's first. You have to buy a house before you can get an assistant!

0831180407001907--.name: Gosh, you're a Knight! I may be a humble guard now, but someday I want to be just like you.

0831180407001908--.name: You know, an old friend of mine left town to become a Berserker. I wonder how he's doing...

0831180407001909--.name: If you're a Wizard, then you'll want to visit $map:02000031$. Even the fairies of $map:02000023$ say our library is the best.

0831180407001910--.name: It is an honor to serve you, Priest. How is the empress doing?

0831180407001911--.name: You're a Green Hood, aren't you? That's great. We guard could use the support of people like you during these crazy times.

0831180407001912--.name: You're a Heavy Gunner, aren't you? I've always wanted to visit $map:2000270$.

0831180407001913--.name: We're watching you, Thief. You are a guest of the kingdom, but we won't abide any criminal activity.

0831180407001914--.name: Know this, Assassin. $map:02000001$ is a city of light.

0831180407001905--.name: If you're looking to take up a job, you should make a stop at the $map:02000188$ in the center of $map:02000001$. Job masters from all over the world are gathered there.

0831180407001906--.name: The timing is pretty lucky for you. If it weren't for the empress's court, they wouldn't be here. Of course, if you aren't at least level 10, they won't even talk to you.

0215111307005862--.name: They say Runeblades are masters of swordsmanship and magic. Being good at either one is hard enough... How did you manage to master both?

0601215907006327-Striker-.name: Hey, you're the Gray Wolf of $map:02000100$, aren't you? They say that you're a master martial artist and that you're taking the fight straight to the gangsters! A real champion of the people! You're my hero! Though... I thought you'd be taller.

0601215907006328-Striker-.name: You've mistaken me for someone else.

0601215907006329-Striker-.name: R-really? I'm sorry. I always wanted to meet $male:him,female:her$ in person. I guess I just got excited.

0806021307007131-SoulBinder-.name: Not many people know this, but there's a sect of animal people who live in the mountains and practice mysterious martial arts. I've heard legends that they can even bring the dead back to life...

0831180407001925--.name: Welcome to $map:02000001$. How may I help you?

0831180407001927--.name: What happened to the empress's celebration?

0831180407001928--.name: Hey there. I'm new in town.

0831180407001930--.name: $map:02000001$ is the biggest city in all of Maple World and the seat of $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$'s power.

0831180407001931--.name: $map:02000025$ watches over the city from the north. It's off-limits to the public, I'm afraid. Her majesty's safety takes priority over the curiosity of tourists.
