0831180407001966--.name: Hey there. I'm new in town.

0831180407001968--.name: $map:02000001$ is the biggest city in all of Maple World and the seat of $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$'s power.

0831180407001969--.name: $map:02000025$ watches over the city from the north. It's off-limits to the public, I'm afraid. Her majesty's safety takes priority over the curiosity of tourists.

0831180407001970--.name: The $map:02000188$, the Banners of Glory, and a taxi stop are all conveniently located in the center of the city. For a reasonable fee, you can hire a taxi to take you to any other taxi stop you've visited, you know. Oh, and the job instructors from all over are gathered in the $map:02000188$.

0831180407001971--.name: The Banners of Glory in front of the palace mark the victories of certain powerful guilds and individuals. We update the banners all the time, so you can stop by whenever you like to see who has the most trophies and victories.

0831180407001972--.name: In the northern parts of the city, you'll find the royal office and library. $map:02000031$ is a must-see for any book lover, of course. It's not the biggest library in Maple World, but I like to think that it's the best. When I'm off-duty, I love to wander the stacks.

0831180407001973--.name: Behind the library is a shopping district where you can find special items, anything from home decor to mounts. If you have $itemPlural:90000006$ from guild battles, you should speak to $npcName:11000620[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11000626[gender:1]$.

0831180407001974--.name: To the southwest, you'll find shops that sell equipment and other supplies. $npcName:11000004[gender:0]$ is one of the best smiths in the land, and $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ sells all the latest herbs and potions. Never pick a fight without a stack of potions, I always say.

0831180407001975--.name: Head southeast and you'll find the residential district and hospital. Kick your feet up and relax after a long journey at $map:02000033$. Have your ailments treated by Tria's finest physician at $map:02000125$. And there's nothing $npcName:11000038[gender:0]$ can't cure.

0831180407001976--.name: And that's $map:02000001$ in a nutshell. A long, wordy nutshell. If I told you everything about the city, you'd be here all night. Is there anything else you want to know?

0831180407001977--.name: I know that you probably came from very far away to see the empress, but these things can't be helped. Thank you for understanding that we had to cancel the open court in the face of unexpected disaster.

0831180407001978--.name: $map:02000001$ is the political, economic, and cultural heart of Maple World, so it's always crowded. But in preparation for open court, there must have been ten times the normal number of people here.

0831180407001979--.name: Of course, when you have so many people in one place, problems are certain to crop up. Thieves, con artists, and the incident at the celebra—Oops. Maybe I shouldn't have said that.

0831180407001980--.name: Anyway, Captain $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ is determined to keep the peace. Enjoy your stay here, and stay out of trouble. For your own sake.

0831180407001991--.name: Everyone in Maple World dreams of having a home to call their own. The empress and her court work tirelessly to open up new plots of land, but there's only so much space, so not many people can have the luxury of owning a magnicifent villa.

0831180407001992--.name: If you don't have a house yet, you should consider $map:02000001$. Property in the city proper is expensive, but the outlying suburb of $map:02000002$ is partially subsidized by the empress. And there's always $map:02000119$... And $map:02000064$...

0831180407001993--.name: There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling $map:02000092$.

0831180407001994--.name: And the merchants in $map:02000036$, west of $map:02000023$, have all kinds of interesting furnishings for sale. Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

0831180407001995--.name: If you already have a house, you could always hire an assistant or two to keep you company. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in the northwestern district of $map:02000001$ hires them out. But first thing's first. You have to buy a house before you can get an assistant!

0831180407001983--.name: Gosh, you're a Knight! I may be a humble guard now, but someday I want to be just like you.

0831180407001984--.name: You know, an old friend of mine left town to become a Berserker. I wonder how he's doing...

0831180407001985--.name: If you're a Wizard, then you'll want to visit $map:02000031$. Even the fairies of $map:02000023$ say our library is the best.

0831180407001986--.name: It is an honor to serve you, Priest. How is the empress doing?

0831180407001987--.name: You're a Green Hood, aren't you? That's great. We guard could use the support of people like you during these crazy times.

0831180407001988--.name: You're a Heavy Gunner, aren't you? I've always wanted to visit $map:2000270$.

0831180407001989--.name: We're watching you, Thief. You are a guest of the kingdom, but we won't abide any criminal activity.

0831180407001990--.name: Know this, Assassin. $map:02000001$ is a city of light.

0831180407001981--.name: If you're looking to take up a job, you should make a stop at the $map:02000188$ in the center of $map:02000001$. Job masters from all over the world are gathered there.

0831180407001982--.name: The timing is pretty lucky for you. If it weren't for the empress's court, they wouldn't be here. Of course, if you aren't at least level 10, they won't even talk to you.

0215111307005864--.name: They say Runeblades are masters of swordsmanship and magic. Being good at either one is hard enough... How did you manage to master both?

0601215907006333-Striker-.name: Hey, you're the Gray Wolf of $map:02000100$, aren't you? They say that you're a master martial artist and that you're taking the fight straight to the gangsters! A real champion of the people! You're my hero! Though... I thought you'd be taller.

0601215907006334-Striker-.name: You've mistaken me for someone else.

0601215907006335-Striker-.name: R-really? I'm sorry. I always wanted to meet $male:him,female:her$ in person. I guess I just got excited.

0806021307007132-SoulBinder-.name: Not many people know this, but there's a sect of animal people who live in the mountains and practice mysterious martial arts. I've heard legends that they can even bring the dead back to life...

0831180407001998--.name: Sailors are rugged on the outside, but soft on the inside.

0831180407001999--.name: Can't believe the storms blew my customers away...

0831180407002000--.name: You're not from around here, are you?

0831180407002001--.name: Why is the harbor so empty?

0831180407002003--.name: Ugh, don't let me get started. Not too long ago, there was a big storm that rolled in with a tsunami, and all the regular ships we used to get here stopped coming in. Let me tell you, before the storm this place was packed with ships.

0831180407002004--.name: If it's seafood you want, I'm your woman. Sushi plates, crab cakes, calamari, I make it all! Freshest catches you'll find anywhere without catching 'em yourself!

0831180407002005--.name: ...And if you can wait an hour or three, I can make some for you. The storms have fouled up the fishermen, so I'm still waiting on today's catch. What a life, huh?

0831180407002007--.name: Maybe tomorrow, I'll find that whale...

0831180407002008--.name: I haven't shaved for months, and my chin is itching something fierce!

0831180407002009--.name: Ahoy there! Have you ever seen a whale?

0831180407002012--.name: Bah, nonsense! I've been a fisherman my whole life, and only seen a whale once. And it was a teeny one at that! Me dream is to see the great blue whale just once before the sea takes me.

0831180407002013--.name: Aye, they're an elusive catch. I've always wanted to see a blue whale myself.

0831180407002015--.name: Why's everyone so spooked? It was just an earthquake.

0831180407002016--.name: Ahhhh, I'm so bored. Aren't you?

0831180407002017--.name: Everyone's all freaked out about the storm and the earthquake, but so what? We need some excitement around here!

0831180407002018--.name: I love staying around the house.

0831180407002019--.name: There's nothing like rolling around in bed all day.

0831180407002020--.name: I don't want to go outside. I don't want a tan!

0831180407002021--.name: My girlfriend keeps bugging me to go out, even though it's a great day to relax inside. You get that, right? Make her see reason. If she always insists on doing... things, I worry about our future.

0831180407002034--.name: What? Is there something you want to ask me?

0831180407002035--.name: It's so beautiful today. Come on, let's go outside.

0831180407002036--.name: Stop being such a troll and let's go out, please? Honey...

0831180407002037--.name: It's such a nice day to go for a walk or get some juice, but my dumb lump of a boyfriend wants to stay inside. Look at him, he's not even doing anything! Can you convince him to do something with his life?

0831180407002045--.name: Uh-oh. Please don't say you're in love with me.

0831180407002047--.name: Hey, I know what you're thinking, and that's not why I'm here at $map:02000107$. I'm all natural! No cosmetic surgery here! I just came to get some fresh air, and check out the latest beauty... trends. While I'm at it.

0831180407002050--.name: Will I look better if I change my style?

0831180407002051--.name: Others say Chief Hairdresser $npcName:11000255[gender:1]$ is the best, but I like $npcName:11000253[gender:0]$'s style.

0831180407002053--.name: Who doesn't want to look pretty?

0831180407002055--.name: Should I put on some cosmetics? Or should I try a new skin tone?

0831180407002056--.name: What brings you to $map:02000107$? Since you're here, I was thinking about changing up my skin tone again. Do you think I should do it?

0831180407002064--.name: I know height isn't everything, but I really don't like being shorter than most people...

0831180407002067--.name: Real men aren't scared of spiders! They squash them flat as soon as they see them!

0831180407002068--.name: This place behind me is loaded with spiders. If you're in a hurry, you can squash them yourself.

0831180407002072--.name: I hope you hit the jackpot!

0831180407002073--.name: I don't recognize you. Is this your first time here?

0831180407002074--.name: You've been staring at me. Interested?

0831180407002077--.name: $map:02000100$ would never have been developed without the help of $npcName:11000252[gender:0]$!

0831180407002079--.name: The Goldus way! Put your back into it! Pinch a penny, make a penny!

0831180407002083--.name: $MyPCName$, do you have a friend that you miss? Someone you always think of?

0831180407002084--.name: I love how high this place is. The view is so beautiful.

0831180407002085--.name: I have a friend not far from here, but being away from him is agony. I wonder how he's doing...

0831180407002088--.name: That's... Um... Sheesh, $MyPCName$! You wouldn't know even if I told you! Don't you miss someone like that?

0831180407002089--.name: Do you think so? I think so, too...

0831180407002090--.name: I know he's doing well. He's strong enough to get through anything.

0831180407002091--.name: But sometimes bad things happen, and that's why I'm worried about him. $MyPCName$, could you pray for his well-being?

0831180407002094--.name: You're very kind! I consider you a good friend, $MyPCName$. I'll be praying for you, too.

0831180407002095--.name: Oh, $MyPCName$... You must not have many friends...

0831180407002096--.name: Do, mi, so, do! How may I help you?

0831180407002097--.name: Hm, this is not the sound I want...

0831180407002099--.name: As a musician, I want to make music from the most beautiful tones of nature. That's my dream.

0831180407002101--.name: Remember people, put any Vayar stone fragments you find on the work cart.

0831180407002102--.name: $npcName:11000328[gender:0]$ has asked us to gather $itemPlural:30000055$ from the quarry in this work cart. I have no idea why he wants useless junk like this.

0831180407002103--.name: I'm busy. Why are you bothering me?

0831180407002105--.name: I really could use some help.

0831180407002106--.name: I can't get anything done because of those monsters!

0831180407002107--.name: If only those monsters weren't here...

0831180407002108--.name: I'm busy. If you're not going to help, then at least don't get in my way.

0831180407002109--.name: Judging by the rough handwriting, I think $npcName:11000441[gender:0]$ wrote this note.

0831180407002110--.name: Judging by the rough handwriting, I think $npcName:11000441[gender:0]$ wrote this note.

0831180407002111--.name: Check the note about the starting time.

0831180407002112--.name: Check the note about how to play the game.

0831180407002113--.name: Check the note about earning rewards.

0831180407002114--.name: I know these folks aren't just here to see $npcName:11000441[gender:0]$. Don't worry, I'll start the game when we've got enough people.

0831180407002115--.name: Step on the red tile to jump to the center of the cave. Once there, you can step on the blue tile there when you want to leave.

0831180407002116--.name: When the game begins, the tiles you're standing on will start disappearing. Last as long as you can without falling, and if you're the last one standing, you win! Easy, right?

0831180407002117--.name: In addition to mesos, the winners will get a special reward: $npcName:11000441[gender:0]$'s Blessing, which increases their Movement Speed for 15 seconds.

0831180407002118--.name: Do you want a reward? Then join up and complete the game!

0831180407002128--.name: Yeesh, I don't know if they'll have room for me. I've been out all day. I really need to put my feet up.

0831180407002130--.name: Tee hee! I want to become $npcName:22000321$ as soon as I can!

0831180407002132--.name: Down below, $npcName:22000321$ has claimed all of the $map:2000202$ for herself!

0831180407002133--.name: She's bad, but... so cool! I want to be a monster mushroom like her!

0831180407002137--.name: Ah... Doesn't $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ look handsome? As for you? Not so much.

0831180407002141--.name: Rumor has it $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ likes bad girls. I'd better become one, and quick!

0831180407002143--.name: Oof... I think I'm going to faint...

0831180407002144--.name: I wish he would hold me in his arms, just once...

0831180407002145--.name: He's so hot, and his voice is amaaazing. When I hear him sing, I can hardly control myself!

0831180407002149--.name: Eww, you're ugly! Get out of the way!

0831180407002151--.name: I don't care what others say.

0831180407002152--.name: Heh! Just watch me. This is only the beginning.

0831180407002153--.name: Right now, Goldus Group is the biggest company in $map:02000100$, but that'll soon change. I'll be crushing $npcName:11000252[gender:0]$ under my heel before you know it.

0831180407002154--.name: What? You want to know if I'm single?

0831180407002155--.name: Hah! I don't need a man. All men are narcissistic, chauvinist pigs. I hate them!

0831180407002156--.name: Can't you see I'm busy? If it's not urgent, then scram.

0831180407002157--.name: I don't sell anything on credit. I trust money more than I trust people.

0105003907007685-NPCPortal01-.name: Hold on, you can't just walk there. Time is valuable, you know.

0831180407002159--.name: Man, I never seem to have time to rest.

0831180407002160--.name: I wonder how Mother is doing. I haven't seen her for a while.

0831180407002161--.name: I've spoken with many people who are frustrated that the court will not be held.

0831180407002162--.name: It must be difficult to explain it to every single person.

0831180407002163--.name: It certainly is, but I understand their frustration. They came all the way here to attend the court, only to have their plans ruined. They're upset and disappointed.

0831180407002164--.name: Whatever the reason, I still feel personally responsible since I was the one charged with the preparations.

0831180407002165--.name: My job is to make sure $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ and the other members of the royal family have everything they need for their day. I'm always busy, but I take pride in my position and my service to $map:02000025$.

0831180407002166--.name: Have you been to $map:02000076$? My mother lives there. I really should visit her, but I've been so busy that I haven't had the time since preparations began.

0831180407002167--.name: Once my work here is done and I've sorted out all the issues, I'll go and visit her first thing! I've been sending her letters, it's just... she can't see. A disease took her eyesight. Sigh...

0105003907007686-NPCPortal01-.name: Here, use this portal to go where you want.

0831180407002172--.name: Did... Did you come to see me?

0831180407002173--.name: My best facial feature is... my philtrum...

0831180407002174--.name: I want to live in peace, like I used to...

0831180407002175--.name: I thought that if we went deeper into the forest, we could keep $npcName:11000751[gender:1]$ safer...

0831180407002176--.name: Others pointed their fingers and called us cowards, but we didn't care. We just wanted to keep our charge safe...

0831180407002177--.name: Not just anyone can sit on me.

0831180407002178--.name: You kick me, and I'm not going to be the one in pain.

0626205807010385--.name: You better leave while I'm still in a good mood. I'm no ordinary rock.

0831180407002181--.name: As long as you know who you are and what you believe, what others think of you doesn't matter. That's the way we Boroboros live.

0831180407002185--.name: Ah, $MyPCName$! Good to see you again. I made it home safely, all thanks to you. I thought Dad would be mad, but he let me in without saying a word.

0831180407002186--.name: I've decided to stay out of trouble and be good. Come back and visit, will you?

1217012607005229--.name: This baroque design is so... baroqueish.

1217012607005230--.name: This place is... How do I say? Full of contradictions. A rich, gorgeous facade that hides a lingering melancholy. This hotel is luxurious, but it's not for the regular people who live around it. Those people belong to a different world.

0831180407002190--.name: Who are you? Stop bothering me.

0831180407002192--.name: Who are you? I don't recognize you.

0831180407002194--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180407002196--.name: You must pay for what you did!

0831180407002197--.name: If you do something you shouldn't, then you must pay the price.

0831180407002198--.name: Pull some weeds and show me how sorry you are. I'll consider reducing your sentence.

0831180407002199--.name: Maybe you don't realize this, but I'm the warden of this prison. I don't take walk-ins.

0831180407002200--.name: I'm here to make amends for my deeds.

0831180407002202--.name: All misdeeds must be punished. The punishment must fit the crime, or else we risk the criminal committing their crimes again.

0831180407002203--.name: How can I reduce my sentence?

0831180407002207--.name: See the prisoners in here? Remember that you can always end up the same if you fail to heed the law.

0831180407002208--.name: And that's the reason I have a tourist program here. You could learn a thing or two.

0831180407002204--.name: How bold! You realize I don't issue pardons...

0831180407002206--.name: Will you, now? Hmm... I like the sound of that. In some cases, hard labor can substitute for time served. How about you pull the weeds in the prison yard? Do a good job, and I'll consider reducing your sentence.

1210061907004881--.name: Maybe you don't realize this, but I'm the warden of this prison. I don't take walk-ins.

1210061907004883--.name: Who? You can't expect me to remember every rodent who comes in and out of $map:2000124$.

1210061907004884--.name: Trust me, you'd remember this guy.

1210061907004885--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She listens begrudgingly as you describe $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$.)</font>
As a matter of fact, I do remember him. There was something mysterious about the man.

1210061907004886--.name: Do you know why he was here?

1210061907004887--.name: Only two kinds of people come to $map:2000124$: tourists and convicts. Since he's not rotting in one of our cells, I suppose he must have been a tourist.

0831180407002210--.name: If you're looking for the $map:2000216$, you came to the right place.

0831180407002213--.name: I'm not surprised you haven't heard of it. This is a place that services people with extraordinary taste.

0831180407002214--.name: Looking for items to invest in? Have rare items to sell? This is the place to do it.

0831180407002215--.name: Whatever your business, you'll find that the goods we broker here are a far cry from those you find in $map:2000100$.

0831180407002216--.name: Talk to one of my brokers below to browse or sell items.

0831180407002217--.name: Note that epic and above items can only be brokered through the $map:2000216$. We'll know if you try to move them without us, and trust me, we will not be pleased.

0831180407002219--.name: Well, aren't you the joker. If you're smart, you won't repeat that question to anyone else.

0831180407002220--.name: For the record, we aren't doing anything illegal here.

0831180407002221--.name: The $map:2000216$ attracts adventurers and tourists from all over Maple World, and that's advantageous to $map:2000100$.

0831180407002222--.name: In fact, the majority of $map:2000100$'s residents support us. The polls all say so.

0711184007006708-Striker-.name: Ah, Gray Wolf. You have business with me? If you're looking for the $map:2000216$, you've come to the right place.

0711184007006711-Striker-.name: I'm not surprised you haven't heard of it. This is a place that services people with extraordinary taste. Our clientèle does not typically mix with rough-and-tumble fighter types.

0711184007006712-Striker-.name: I'll have to check what items I have that are suitable for your skills. Are you looking for something in particular? Or do you have a rare item that you'd like to sell?

0711184007006713-Striker-.name: I don't care either way. The products here are incomparable to those available in $map:2000100$. Heh.

0711184007006714-Striker-.name: Simply talk to the traders here to browse their wares or sell your items on the $map:2000216$. They'll do their best to help you. Probably.

0711184007006715-Striker-.name: Keep in mind that the only place to trade epic and better items is the $map:2000216$. And if you try to secretly trade such items without us, we'll know. You may be the famous Gray Wolf, but this is our field of expertise.

0711184007006717-Striker-.name: I'm telling you this for your own good. A place like this draws a lot of attention. Even now, agents from many organizations are watching us.

0711184007006718-Striker-.name: Not many people recognize you as a threat. But if you keep asking questions like that, they'll start to take notice. You don't want that. Understand?

0711184007006719-Striker-.name: You may not be Blackstar's biggest fan, but not everything it does is bad. The $map:2000216$ has drawn adventurers and traders from all over Maple World. I'd say that it's single-handedly put $map:2000100$ and $map:2000135$ on the map.

0711184007006720-Striker-.name: The people of $map:2000100$ are thankful for what we've done for the community. So I suggest you keep your opinions about Blackstar to yourself while you're here.

0831180407002226--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180407002227--.name: If you're not here for the job, please leave.

0831180407002228--.name: Ugh, I'm tired of this rotting smell.

0831180407002229--.name: Industrialization, urban development... I don't know who'll really benefit from all that.

0831180407002237--.name: After my father passed away, I found his journal among his things. My father was the guardian of the Blue Lapenta, and he wanted $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ to be his successor. So I knew.

0831180407002238--.name: I knew there was no way $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ did what the others said he did.

0831180407002239--.name: I'm glad the truth finally came out and everything is back to normal, even though $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ hasn't paid for his crimes.

0831180407002240--.name: Being with $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ reminds me of the gorilla pie that we used to bake together when we were young.

0831180407002241--.name: What could gorilla pie possibly be...?

0831180407002242--.name: It's one of those pies topped with walnuts, almonds, and blueberries. When $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ and I first made it, it was so bumpy and ugly that it looked like a gorilla. Why? What did you think it was?

0831180407002245--.name: Don't sweat it. Crime is pretty bad around here. That's just how it is.

0831180407002249--.name: Once I get out of here...

0831180407002250--.name: I need to find a better place to hide. The Dark Wind would have no trouble finding me here.

0831180407002251--.name: Welcome. It's nice to meet you.

0831180407002254--.name: $MyPCName$, I can't believe we're meeting again like this. I can see in your eyes how much you've grown since last we met. Do you remember what I told you then? That the world would need a hero?

0831180407002255--.name: Looking at you now, I believe that you're the one.

0831180407002256--.name: Ha ha ha, you look like you have many questions for me. What do you want to know?

0831180407002257--.name: How did you end up on Victoria Island?

0831180407002259--.name: This $map:02000051$ is where I was born and raised. The last time I left, I swore I'd never return... I thought that was best for everyone here.

0831180407002260--.name: But something happened, and it made me wonder if I made the right decision. I came back to finish what I couldn't finish then.

0831180407002262--.name: That's... I'll tell you when I'm ready.

0831180407002263--.name: I couldn't ignore the wish of a dying man. Even if he was a prisoner...

0831180407002264--.name: And when he awoke after his brush with death, I could see in his eyes that he was innocent. I didn't ask any questions, but I knew I had to help him.

0831180407002265--.name: Stay true to yourself, and you can overcome anything. No matter how difficult it is, you can do it.

0831180407002270--.name: Dark Wind has changed too much. Now it's crushing the citizens under authoritarian rule instead of protecting them like they used to. I can't let this continue.

0831180407002271--.name: $MyPCName$, do the people in this city look happy to you?

0831180407002274--.name: Then you're a fool. There's no point in discussing this further. Leave.

0831180407002275--.name: Try to see through their deceptions. It's not hard to find the rotting heart of this city.

0105003907007688-NPCPortal01-.name: Wait! It's going to be a long journey. Use this instead.

0831180407002277--.name: I mostly paint portraits. Would you like to know why?

0831180407002278--.name: Because the most beautiful thing in the world is people! That's why I like painting them.

0831180407002279--.name: Would you like to know when I started painting?

0831180407002280--.name: Well, that's... I don't know. Do you remember when you started eating food on your own? Or when you spoke your first word?

0831180407002281--.name: Picking up a brush was as natural to me as picking up a spoon. I was born to paint. I don't need to know exactly when I started doing it.

0831180407002282--.name: When I have a brush in my hand, I feel like the world makes sense.

0831180407002285--.name: Kids these days... they don't even read books!

0831180407002286--.name: Sigh... Maybe it's time I close this bookstore once and for all.

0831180407002287--.name: Cough, cough... It's so dusty in here! I've had it with all these old books.

0831180407002288--.name: Are you really going to close your bookstore?

0831180407002289--.name: Well, I'm certainly thinking about it. Ha ha... My bookstore is the oldest business on $map:02000147$, you know. I'd rather keep it open, but I'm getting too old to run it on my own.

0831180407002293--.name: Ha, do you? People like you amaze me. I've owned this store for over thirty years, but reading always puts me right to sleep. It's so boring.

0831180407002294--.name: I'm glad not everyone feels like I do. I'd have long since shut down, ha!

0831180407002295--.name: You don't? Ha, you're just like me. I've owned this store for over thirty years, but reading always puts me right to sleep. It's so boring. Just between you and me, I've never finished a single book in my whole life.

0831180407002297--.name: Ah, we haven't had many guests lately. Do you know why?

0831180407002298--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180407002300--.name: Unless you've worked a day here, you can't truly appreciate what we're doing.

0831180407002301--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180407002302--.name: Hm... This is an easy case.

0831180407002303--.name: I handle corpses for a living. There's not much that can rattle me anymore.

0831180407002309--.name: The worst thing that can happen to anyone is losing their home. It's like having the ground ripped out from under you.

0831180407002310--.name: An eye for an eye... I'm going to teach them what it feels like to have your life shaken to its roots.

0831180407002312--.name: We should dance! Never stop dancing!

0831180407002313--.name: If you're not happy with your life, you should dance. When your body's happy, your mind will be too!

0831180407002315--.name: It's going to take forever to replace all these...

0831180407002316--.name: Safety is the primary concern for folks who work in places like this.

0831180407002318--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180407002319--.name: Want to see what I've got inside this bundle? Then show me your wallet first! Ha, just kidding...

0831180407002324--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180407002327--.name: The militia will do everything we can to help you. We have to join forces to protect our world.

0831180407002330--.name: I've met more people today than I did all last year.

0831180407002331--.name: Is today some kind of holiday? Why is everyone so busy? I think I've met more people today than in my entire life.

0831180407002335--.name: I must report this situation to my captain...

0831180407002336--.name: My fellow scouts have been scattered... we're on the brink...

0105003907007690-NPCPortal01-.name: L-let me stand first... Ugh... Your portal is ready.

0831180407002337--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180407002338--.name: If you've got business here, talk to a broker. Keep your hands to yourself. I'll be watching.

0831180407002340--.name: Can you see me? That's impressive.

0831180407002341--.name: I have the ability to meld with the darkness. What can you do?

0831180407002343--.name: We'll clean up $map:02000100$. Just you wait.

0831180407002344--.name: Stay out of trouble. You don't want to end up like Dark Wind.

1109170307009216-NPCPortal01-.name: I'll speed you along your way.

0831180407002357--.name: It must be a new product.

0831180407002359--.name: I had no idea about this...

0831180407002362--.name: I want to buy everything in here.

0831180407002363--.name: I wish I had more money...

0831180407002365--.name: I don't know which one to buy...

0831180407002369--.name: Let's see how much this usually is...

0831180407002384--.name: Everything in this world has energy, and lava has the most potent energy of all!

0831180407002386--.name: There are all kinds of fairies in this world.

0831180407002387--.name: There are so many different kinds of fairies, I've lost count.

0831180407002391--.name: Oh, me? I'm studying these creatures we call the fairfolk. All kinds of fairfolk inhabit forests like this.

0831180407002394--.name: I've got so many things to do!

0831180407002395--.name: I have to do homework, and I have to study...

0831180407002396--.name: One of the fairfolk left this note.

0831180407002399--.name: Ugh... I shouldn't have done that...

0831180407002401--.name: There are treasure chests hidden all over the world, and they're highly sought after by adventurers.

0831180407002402--.name: What can I do for you?

0831180407002404--.name: Originally my name was Cello, but I've changed it to Charles. That sounds more sophisticated, doesn't it?

0831180407002407--.name: You still have your $item:30000145$. Why don't you use it? You won't regret it.

0831180407002408--.name: Welcome, $MyPCName$! How may I help you today?

0831180407002410--.name: $MyPCName$, you already got a free $item:30000145$ through the promotion. If you want more, then you'll have to pay 10,000 mesos each.

0831180407002412--.name: Never mind, I don't want it.

0831180407002413--.name: Okay, just one more reminder then. If you already own a house, then you cannot buy a Maple Apartment. Makes sense, I'm sure.

0831180407002416--.name: You've made the right decision. Buying a house just makes more sense financially than $item:30000145$.

0831180407002417--.name: Oh, I'm sorry. Maple World real estate regulations restrict families to only one house. You can only buy a Maple Apartment if you don't have a house. If anything changes, feel free to come back. Bye for now!

0831180407002418--.name: Good, then it's 10,000 mesos for a $item:30000145$.

0831180407002420--.name: Here's your $item:30000145$. I hope you enjoy your new home. Bye for now!

0831180407002421--.name: Ah, I'm afraid the transaction didn't go through. Please make sure you have enough money and free space in your bag for the item.

0831180407002422--.name: House prices have been dropping lately, attracting many potential buyers. It's kept me quite busy!

0831180407002423--.name: You still have your $item:30000255$. Why don't you use it? You won't regret it.

0831180407002424--.name: Welcome, $MyPCName$! How may I help you today?

0831180407002426--.name: $MyPCName$, you already got a free $item:30000255$ through the promotion. If you want more, then you'll have to pay 10,000 mesos each.

0831180407002428--.name: Never mind, I don't want it.

0831180407002429--.name: Okay, just one more reminder then. If you already own a house, then you cannot buy a Maple Apartment. Makes sense, I'm sure.

0831180407002432--.name: You've made the right decision. Buying a house just makes more sense financially than $item:30000255$.

0831180407002433--.name: Oh, I'm sorry. Maple World real estate regulations restrict families to only one house. You can only buy a Maple Apartment if you don't have a house. If anything changes, feel free to come back. Bye for now!

0831180407002434--.name: Good, then it's 10,000 mesos for a $item:30000255$.

0831180407002436--.name: Here's your $item:30000255$. I hope you enjoy your new home. Bye for now!

0831180407002437--.name: Ah, I'm afraid the transaction didn't go through. Please make sure you have enough money and free space in your bag for the item.

0831180407002466--.name: Here's your $item:30000253$. I hope you enjoy your new home. Bye for now!

0831180407002467--.name: Ah, I'm afraid the transaction didn't go through. Please make sure you have enough money and free space in your bag for the item.

0831180407002469--.name: We've made many sacrifices. I pray they weren't for naught...

0831180407002473--.name: The world is relying on your strength. May the empress's blessing be with you.

1215105907009721--.name: Empress's blessings, $MyPCName$! What brings you here?

1215105907009722--.name: I've heard a lot of rumors circulating through town.

1215105907009723--.name: Ah, yes, as have we. A dark aura begins to spread over Maple World once more.

1215105907009725--.name: I'm afraid I have no more information than anyone else. However... I sense that the strange occurrences of late are harbingers of a greater darkness. A threat unlike any we have faced.

0831180407002479--.name: Ugh... What... brings you... to me?

0831180407002480--.name: Ugh... I wanted to help everyone...

0831180407002482--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180407002483--.name: If only I was a little bit stronger...

0831180407002484--.name: I'll see you soon... my friend...

0105003907007691-NPCPortal01-.name: Let me get up... I'll make a temporary portal...

0831180407002486--.name: Keep it down out there, I'm trying to read!

0831180407002502--.name: Merchants like me and the palace workers are only allowed entry through the underground passageway. I wonder if I'll ever have the honor of passing through the main gates...

0831180407002503--.name: How may I help you look your best?

0831180407002505--.name: What do I do if $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$'s creditors come after me? How could he hang me out to dry like this?

0831180407002509--.name: I can't afford to get tired. Not yet.

0831180407002510--.name: No one knows what it's like to toil in this place. Only another captive could understand.

0105003907007693-NPCPortal01-.name: Give me a moment, and I'll send you on your way.

0831180407002511--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180407002513--.name: I can't return to Maple World until I save these people. I'll never be able to forgive myself if I leave them behind.

0105003907007694-NPCPortal01-.name: Let me help you get going.

0831180407002515--.name: I don't expect anything from the empire anymore.

0831180407002516--.name: The empire turned its back on these people when they needed it the most. Someone had to step in and protect them. And the empire will get what it deserves.

0831180407002517--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180407002518--.name: We can't just wait. We have to do something.

0831180407002519--.name: Don't compare us to the empire. They care more about their hierarchy than the safety of their charges. Their hypocrisy is disgusting.

0831180407002522--.name: Hmph, I can't believe I have to investigate this!

0831180407002524--.name: How on the world am I supposed to fix these wagons? I can't carry them back to town!

0831180407002526--.name: It's nice to be outside sometimes.

0831180407002527--.name: We need more people to handle the damage.

0831180407002528--.name: Mushrooms want wooden ladders. Just wooden ones!

0831180407002532--.name: $map:02000051$ is a great place to raise a family like mine. Its highlands are safe from monsters on the ground, and my children can practice flying!

0831180407002535--.name: Have you heard how some people coddle their children? It's ridiculous to me! You've got to toughen up your kids, so they can fend for themselves in any situation!

0831180407002537--.name: No prisoner will ever escape on my watch.

0831180407002538--.name: Hey, you there! Keep it down!

0831180407002539--.name: If you cause any trouble, it's the dungeon for you!

0831180407002540--.name: You're touring $map:02000124$, are you? Stick to the route, then. You wouldn't want to mess with some of these prisoners.

0831180407002541--.name: What kinds of offenses have these prisoners committed?

0831180407002542--.name: Can they get their sentences reduced?

0831180407002543--.name: They've spoken lies or slander about certain people or places, publicly supported or attacked public groups, or used chat, displays, UGC, or character names to offend others.

0831180407002544--.name: Of course, one doesn't get thrown into prison for committing these offenses just once. They're given multiple chances to redeem themselves first. If they still refuse to see the error of their ways and keep making the same mistakes, then they will receive punishment from $npcTitle:11000514[gender:1]$ and Judge $npcName:11000514[gender:1]$.

0831180407002545--.name: $npcName:11000514[gender:1]$'s punishment can make their life in Maple World very difficult. But if they prove how sorry they are, they can have their sentence reduced.

0831180407002546--.name: Pulling weeds in the prison yard is one way of proving that, but so far I haven't seen any prisoner pull weeds long enough to have their sentence reduced. It just proves that some people don't change.

0831180407002547--.name: For more information about the prison, please refer to this brochure. Enjoy your tour.

0831180407002548--.name: You already have a $item:39000009$. I hope it'll help guide you around $map:02000124$.

0831180407002550--.name: No prisoner will ever escape on my watch.

0831180407002551--.name: Hey, you there! Keep it down!

0831180407002552--.name: If you cause any trouble, it's the dungeon for you!

0831180407002574--.name: You already have a $item:39000009$. I hope it'll help guide you around $map:02000124$.

0831180407002576--.name: Please, get me out of here...

0831180407002577--.name: I'm sorry... I won't swear again, I swear!

0831180407002578--.name: Come on, cut me some slack...

0831180407002579--.name: Get me out of here, would ya? I've got a stash on the outside. A million mesos for my freedom. What'cha say?

0831180407002580--.name: No way, you're in for fraud! That's the worst!

0831180407002581--.name: Bah, how did you know I'm in here for fraud? Did the warden tell you? If you're not going to get me out of here, then scram!

1210061907004888--.name: Get me out of here, would ya? I've got a stash on the outside. A million mesos for my freedom. What'cha say?

1210061907004890--.name: Sure I do, sure! Just help me break out, and I'll tell you all about it.

1210061907004892--.name: She's got... hair. A real smart-looking gal. And really pretty, too.

1210061907004894--.name: You were testing me? Get outta here, you rat! If you ain't gonna help me, just leave me alone!

0831180407002583--.name: Argh, the toilet is clogged again!

0831180407002584--.name: Warden, I need this toilet unclogged!

0831180407002585--.name: Another tourist? Come to see all the animals in their cages?

0831180407002586--.name: How did you end up in here?

0831180407002588--.name: Ugh... This smell... The toilet is clogged...

0831180407002587--.name: For swearing. Why? Don't say you never swear. Everyone does it! So why is it such a crime??

0831180407002592--.name: I cursed once. ONCE! I don't deserve to be here!

0831180407002593--.name: Another tourist? Come to see all the animals in their cages?

0831180407002594--.name: How did you end up in here?

0831180407002595--.name: Argh, don't get me started. Why can't I change my own profile image to something I like? So what if the picture is a little bit... lewd?

1210061907004895--.name: Another tourist? Come to see all the animals in their cages?

1210061907004898--.name: Uh... Sure I am. $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ sent me.

1210061907004899--.name: Quiet, or the warden will hear you! You came to see how things are coming along, is that it?

1210061907004901--.name: Then talk to the supervisor. He's the one in charge here.

1210061907004902--.name: Of course. And the supervisor is...?

1210061907004903--.name: $npcName:11000651[gender:0]$. You'll need the password, of course. We change it every three days to keep the guards off our trail.

1210061907004905--.name: The latest password is... Shoot, what was it? Thick shadows... something. Ask one of the other guys.

0831180407002597--.name: How can I get out of here quick?

0831180407002598--.name: Argh, I'm bored to death in here.

0831180407002599--.name: Excuse me... Please get me out of here! I promise I'll never misbehave again!

0831180407002603--.name: I really want to get out of here. Please help me. I'm sorry for what I did. I really am.

0831180407002605--.name: Sigh... This is just my luck...

0831180407002607--.name: When will I be let out? Is it soon? Please?

0831180407002609--.name: That toilet must be clogged too.

0831180407002610--.name: It's been three days since the toilet backed up. Ugh... This smell!

0831180407002612--.name: Argh, this place is a sty! I hate prison!

0831180407002616--.name: Bah, I'm just going to sleep...

0831180407002620--.name: I only made clothes I wanted!

0831180407002621--.name: I know all the guards, and you ain't one of them.

0831180407002622--.name: How did you end up in here?

0831180407002623--.name: I made a T-shirt with a sexy picture on it, so what? That's not a crime!

1210061907004906--.name: I know all the guards, and you ain't one of them.

1210061907004908--.name:
What's it to you?
<font color="#909090">(He narrows his eyes at you.)</font>

1210061907004910--.name: Hm... Yeah, you don't look like no ordinary tourist. Tell him not to worry. Everything's right on schedule.

1210061907004911--.name: I need to see the supervisor.

1210061907004912--.name: Yeah, yeah, sure. That's $npcName:11000651[gender:0]$. But he won't talk to you unless you know the password.

1210061907004914--.name: Hold your horses. I wrote it down somewhere...

1210061907004915--.name: Here we go. "Thick shadows have been cast..." ...something something... "...illuminate light..." Dang, who smudged up the password?

1210061907004916--.name: Sorry, $male:buddy,female:lady$. You got to get the rest from someone else.

1214232607004979--.name: Why can't I just talk to the supervisor?

1214232607004980--.name: Listen, the supervisor won't even talk to me without the password. You don't stand a chance without it.

0831180407002627--.name: Warden, I need this toilet unclogged!

0831180407002628--.name: Argh, this place is a sty! I hate prison!

0831180407002636--.name: Why can't I have the name I want?

0831180407002637--.name: I know all the guards, and you ain't one of them.

0831180407002638--.name: How did you end up in here?

0831180407002639--.name: I used some swear words for my character's name. That's how I want to express myself! Why should I care about other people's feelings?

0831180407002640--.name: You've got a problem in how you think.

0831180407002641--.name: Shut up!  I don't need your lecturing! Go away!

1210061907004917--.name: I know all the guards, and you ain't one of them.

1210061907004919--.name: No, I don't. And I don't wanna.

0831180407002644--.name: That toilet must be clogged too.

0831180407002645--.name: It's been three days since the toilet overflowed...

0831180407002649--.name: Bah, I'm just going to sleep...

0831180407002650--.name: What are you lookin' at? This ain't no zoo, and I ain't no animal! Ahhh, I hate alla you!

0831180407002652--.name: Eww... I'm tired of the mold around the sink!

0831180407002653--.name: I can never completely rid myself of the mold...

0831180407002654--.name: I wonder if the tap water is even clean...

0831180407002655--.name: I can't wait to get out of here. How much longer?

0831180407002659--.name: I cursed once. ONCE! I don't deserve to be here!

0831180407002660--.name: Another tourist? Come to see all the animals in their cages?

0831180407002661--.name: How did you end up in here?

0831180407002662--.name: I swore, and apparently that's SO wrong that they had to throw me into prison?

1211023307004934--.name: Another tourist? Come to see all the animals in their cages?

0831180407002663--.name: When can I get out of here?

0831180407002664--.name: Bah, it'll take forever to get rid of all these weeds!

0831180407002666--.name: The war against weeds is one that can never be won.

0831180407002667--.name: Huh? You don't look like an inmate.

0831180407002669--.name: Are you blind? I'm working! I have to pull a million weeds to have my sentence reduced. Ugh, I'll grow old before I can pull that many weeds.

1210061907004920--.name: Huh? You don't look like an inmate.

1214232707004981--.name: Hm... Yes, there is something special about you. What brings you here, then?

1214232707004983--.name: He's just as impatient as the supervisor, eh? Well, if you're here on business, you better talk to him.

1214232707004985--.name: $npcName:11000651[gender:0]$. But he doesn't talk to nobody without the password. That's the rule. And, to keep things nice and secure, we change it every three days.

1214232707004987--.name: I wrote it down somewhere. Ahem. "In the middle of the shadows..." Drat! The rest got erased.

1214232707004988--.name: Sorry, that's all I know. You'll have to ask someone else for the rest of the password.

0831180407002670--.name: When can I get out of here?

0831180407002671--.name: How many times do I have to say I'm sorry?

0831180407002673--.name: The war against weeds is one that can never be won.

0831180407002676--.name: Are you blind? I'm working! I have to pull a million weeds to have my sentence reduced. Ugh, I'll grow old before I can pull that many weeds.

1210061907004925--.name: You want to talk? Fine. But first, what's the password?

1214233907004998--.name: Haw! You don't know the password? Then we got nothing to talk about.

0831180407002677--.name: When can I get out of here?

0831180407002678--.name: Am I going to be doing chores forever?

0831180407002680--.name: How many times do I have to say I'm sorry?

0831180407002681--.name: Nine thousand nine hundred fifty-five... Nine thousand nine hundred fifty-six...

0831180407002683--.name: Are you blind? I'm working! I have to pull a million weeds to have my sentence reduced. Argh, and now you've made me lose count!

1210061907004926--.name: Nine thousand nine hundred fifty-five... Nine thousand nine hundred fifty-six...

1210061907004928--.name: ...Nine thousand nine hundred six... Drat! You made me lose count!

0831180407002684--.name: When can I get out of here?

0831180407002685--.name: Bah, it'll take forever to get rid of all these weeds!

0831180407002686--.name: Am I going to be doing chores forever?

0831180407002687--.name: The war against weeds is one that can never be won.

0831180407002690--.name: Can't you see? I'm working! If I were you, I would've stayed home napping instead of coming to see a horrible place like this.

1210061907004931--.name: Keep your voice down. We're being watched. You're in the know?

1210061907004932--.name: Uh... Sure I am. $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ sent me.

1214232707004989--.name: We call $npcName:11000651[gender:0]$ the supervisor. He's the one you oughtta be talking to, not me. But good luck getting a peep outta him without the password...

1214232707004991--.name: Haw! Like I'm gonna trust you with that info! If you don't even know the password, how can I trust you? Stoopid!

1214232707004992--.name: I'll be sure to mention you when I see $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$.

1214232707004993--.name: Bah! Fine! The password is... I forget. They change the dang thing every three days, y'know?

1214232707004994--.name: Do you remember any part of it?

1214232707004995--.name: How'd it go? Um... "Enlighten the light," I think. That's all I remember, honest!

1214232707004996--.name: Now get outta here, before the warden notices we been talking.

0831180407002698--.name: There's a mark carved into the wall.

0831180407002701--.name: Do you believe in love at first sight? I do. I fell in love with $npcName:11000151[gender:1]$...

0831180407002706--.name: Bah, it's not easy to set up a date.

0831180407002709--.name: You're a curious sort, aren't you? As the old saying goes, ignorance is bliss.

0831180407002710--.name: Don't stick your nose where it doesn't belong.

0831180407002714--.name: Wait, are you going to go down to the basement?

0831180407002716--.name: Ha! You're funny. I don't know how you got down here, but trust me when I say you NEVER want to go to the 2nd basement. There are some really scary guys down there.

0831180407002717--.name: It's just as well, I don't feel like dealing with you myself. Go on, go to the basement. And don't say I didn't warn you.

0831180407002721--.name: What are you doing here? How did you even GET here?

0831180407002723--.name: Kid, I'm impressed. You made it this far, but it's time for you to go. Leave before something bad happens to you.

0831180407002725--.name: I stay well away from the basement levels. And I live here!

0831180407002726--.name: I had to come down here today, but believe me... I can't WAIT to get back upstairs.

0831180407002727--.name: Don't try anything stupid. Just get out of here!

0831180407002728--.name: <font color="#909090">(One of these books seems out of place.)</font>

0831180407002729--.name: No, no! I don't want to go back in there!

0831180407002730--.name: Hey! Did you just throw me on the ground?

0831180407002731--.name: How did you end up on the bookshelf?

0831180407002732--.name: A stupid monster brought me back here. Please, you've got to take me with you!

0831180407002733--.name: Your bag is full! Make some room for me, will ya?

0831180407002734--.name: <font color="#909090">(You always remember to put books back where you found them... right?)</font>

0831180407002736--.name: It's locked! You need a key!

0831180407002737--.name: Make sure to return books to where they belong!

0831180407002740--.name: <font color="#909090">(This looks like an old journal. You open the faded cover and turn to a dusty page.)</font>

0831180407002741--.name: "When I discovered the secret passageway, I was excited beyond measure. I thought I could finally escape."

0831180407002742--.name: "But at the other end of the passageway, an endless abyss awaited me. Is it really impossible to escape from this misery?"

0831180407002744--.name: Mm? Are you here to challenge me? You can never defeat me, no matter how many times you try. You'd better give up before you get seriously hurt.

0831180407002747--.name: Heh. Interesting. You challenge the undefeated champion of $map:65000001$, the victor of 47 consecutive matches. Very well. I shall give you what you desire.

0831180407002748--.name: But not right now. We gladiators fight only inside the ring. That's our rule.

0831180407002749--.name: As you can also see, I'm quite busy. Perhaps while I attend to my business, you can start to make a name for yourself. Why not go prove your strength at the $map:65000001$?

0831180407002750--.name: You must not have heard about the $map:65000001$. All right, I shall do you the honor of hearing $npcName:11000675[gender:0]$'s own explanation. So listen.

0831180407002751--.name: The $map:65000001$ is a place of battle where up to 10 warriors can take turns battling one on one, until only one remains. The order of their fights is random.

0831180407002752--.name: Unlucky fighters may be eliminated in their very first match. But those who are truly strong, truly deserving, will triumph over fortune and faith.

0831180407002753--.name: I should know. I've done it countless times. Now... Do you still want to challenge me?

0831180407002756--.name: $npcName:11000057[gender:1]$'s soul has hardened like a stone.

0831180407002779--.name: $map:02000227$ is the border between the mortal and spirit realms.

0831180407002789--.name: Someone will come and help us. If not... Sniff...

0831180407002794--.name: Let me go... This is too much...

0831180407002799--.name: $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ is the only one who stayed with me when everyone else turned their backs.

0831180407002800--.name: So I'm going to stand by him, no matter what happens.

0831180407002804--.name: Making potions isn't like cooking at all!

0831180407002806--.name: Making potions is very difficult. The first priority is preparing the ingredients. You need very specific ingredients to make effective potions.

0831180407002807--.name: Some people compare potion brewing to cooking. They're crazy if they think potions are as easy to make as food.

0831180407002808--.name: Here, I'll give you an example. Say you're making fried rice. You can put in just about anything you want. Ham, peppers, carrots, anything you want.

0831180407002809--.name: When you're making a potion, however, you must add the ingredients in the correct order, at the correct time. You can't take your eyes off the cauldron.

0831180407002812--.name: I keep having nightmares. They wake me up all night...

0831180407002814--.name: You get near me, you get hurt.

0831180407002816--.name: Mm... Who's there? I can't see you, but I can sense your burning soul.

0831180407002819--.name: ...Do you mean my eyes? As you can see, I'm blind. I committed a sin so grave that I gave up my eyes in penance.

0831180407002820--.name: I can tell you want to hear my story. I assume $npcName:11000289[gender:0]$ told you about the arena. That is where you can always find a fair fight. No battles to the death, just competitions of strength.

0831180407002821--.name: But I killed someone there. It was an accident, and everyone who watched our fight agreed that it was unavoidable, but I couldn't forgive myself.

0831180407002822--.name: That's why I decided to hide in the darkness. That's all.

0831180407002823--.name: You must be interested in the $map:65000002$. But as its name suggests, it's a dangerous place. Everyone in there is determined to hurt each other in a contest of strength. If you want to join in, you'd better prepare well.

0831180407002824--.name: The $map:65000002$ is a battleground in which up to 10 warriors battle each other for points, and whoever beats more competitors than the others wins. When you beat another warrior, you get points. When you are beaten, you lose them.

0831180407002825--.name: Since so many warriors fight each other at the same time, sometimes things get really chaotic. The winner might not be the strongest of them all, but the smartest.

0831180407002826--.name: It's always good to test your strength, but be careful not to let your excitement get the best of you. That's all I have to tell you. Be on your way.

0831180407002828--.name:
We don't have time for this. I'll take $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ to HQ.
$MyPCName$, please follow $npc:11000057[gender:1]$.

0831180407002831--.name: No... We were so close to catching him...

0831180407002832--.name: Time is of the essence. We must request backup right away.

0831180407002834--.name: Come to sample our juice? $npcName:11000445[gender:1]$ right here will set you up. Hope you're ready for a trip to flavor country!

0831180407002837--.name: What? If you have something to say, say it.

0831180407002838--.name: I'm busy! Oh, where is my husband when I need him most?

0831180407002839--.name: I'm so winded... I can't run.

0831180407002840--.name: What? Do you have business with me?

0714175407006782--.name: Jump from one floaty to the next for a boost!

0714175407006783--.name: Don't fall in the pool, or you'll lose your boosts!

0714175407006784--.name: Jump from floaty to floaty with your friends!

0831180407002845--.name: Why is it that all the beautiful places are so high up?

0831180407002846--.name: I think I can cross this bridge if I don't look down. But... what if I lose my footing because I can't see where I'm going?

0831180407002848--.name: Woo-hoo! Have a great day today!

0831180407002849--.name: Yoo-hoo! Yet another beautiful day has dawned. Isn't it great?

0831180407002852--.name: Since I became a Bunny Gal, every day has been like a dream. I never thought my life could be this fun!

0831180407002853--.name: Oh, you don't think so? Why not? It's all a matter of perspective. You should try to think positive. Like me! Hee hee hee!

0831180407002854--.name: Hm? Where are you staring at?

0831180407002855--.name: I can't help it... you're so pretty!

0831180407002857--.name: Oh, really? Do you think I'm pretty? I wasn't always so pretty, you know. Hee hee hee! I'd like it if you'd come visit me more often. I think I like you!

0831180407002858--.name: Oh, y-you weren't? Hmph, for a moment I thought you had the hots for me.

0831180407002859--.name: But... are you SURE you weren't staring at me?

0831180407002862--.name: No? Well... All right then. If you say you weren't, then you weren't. Oh well!

0831180407002863--.name: You were, right? I knew it. Hee hee! Don't be embarrassed. You aren't the only one who likes to stare at me.

0831180407002864--.name: Wow, $MyPCName$, don't you just love the weather today? Back when I had to stay inside, I could hardly tell what the weather was.

0831180407002865--.name: What happened to you back then?

0831180407002866--.name: Huh? W-well... I don't... I don't want to talk about my past.

0831180407002867--.name: Let's talk about something else, shall we? Keep your head in the present, I always say! Eyes on the prize!

0831180407002871--.name: Dad doesn't want to play with me. $MyPCName$, could you play with me?

0831180407002874--.name: This is because of his liver...

0831180407002875--.name: I have terrapin cousins living in the sea, and one of the most famous terrapins in history is called Byeljubu. Have you heard of him?

0831180407002879--.name: Wah! This thing is eating me alive!

0831180407002881--.name: Err? Are you a traveler? You look... cool.

0831180407002883--.name: What? I'm in the middle of creating music that speaks to the soul!

0831180407002885--.name: Sigh... Do you even know the pain of creation? Bah, there's no soul in this music. If there was, I'd be able to feel it!

0831180407002888--.name: I may be old, but I'm young at heart.

0831180407002889--.name: Where is this smell coming from?

0831180407002890--.name: Don't judge a book by its cover. I may be old, but I'm still a girl on the inside.

0831180407002891--.name: Do you think you can beat me?

0831180407002893--.name: I doubt there's anyone worth challenging here, either.

0831180407002894--.name: Do you want to challenge me? You know how to play rock-paper-scissors, right? Heh, let's do it. Rock, paper, scissors!

0831180407002898--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She plays scissors.)</font>
We tied. Not bad. Do you want to try again?

0831180407002900--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She plays scissors.)</font>
We tied. Why don't you try again?

0831180407002902--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She plays rock.)</font>
I won. Looks like you're no match for me either.

0831180407002904--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She plays rock.)</font>
I won. What's wrong, cat got your tongue? Oh, right... losers don't get to speak! Hee hee... Want to play again?

0831180407002906--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She plays paper.)</font>
Oh no, I lost! I can't believe it!

0831180407002908--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She plays scissors.)</font>
D-did I really just lose?

0831180407002910--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She plays rock.)</font>
We tied. This isn't over. Let's go again!

0831180407002912--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She plays rock.)</font>
We tied. Not bad. Do you want to try again?

0831180407002914--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She plays paper.)</font>
I won. Seems I can't find a good match for me here, either. Do you want to try again?

0831180407002916--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She plays paper.)</font>
I'm tired of winning. I'm willing to play you one more time, though. What do you say?

0831180407002918--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She plays scissors.)</font>
I won. As expected. Do you want to try again?

0831180407002920--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She plays scissors.)</font>
Ahhh... Winning doesn't excite me anymore. Do you want to try again?

0831180407002922--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She plays rock.)</font>
N-no way... D-did I really lose?

0831180407002924--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She plays paper.)</font>
Err? We tied. Let's try again!

0831180407002926--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She plays paper.)</font>
Hmph, tying is no fun. Let's try again.

0831180407002928--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She gives you a sideways scowl.)</font> 
I think you played after I did. You're lucky that my eyes are too old to see clearly.

0831180407002929--.name: Don't you have something for me?

0831180407002931--.name: I already gave you your prize!

0831180407002932--.name: You'd better lighten your bag first if you want a prize.

0831180407002933--.name: Let's get to it! Rock, paper, scissors!

0831180407002937--.name: Do you know how to play rock-paper-scissors? It's a little more complex than making funny shapes with your hand.

0831180407002941--.name: Not all witches are greedy and evil. I've been studying useful spells to help $map:02000023$.

0109145107007725--.name: The air is calm and the water is clear. It's a perfect day to fish!

0109145107007726--.name: The key to fishing is to listen to the sounds they make.

0109145107007727--.name: If you try hard enough, you can even hear them talk!

0831180407002948--.name: I can see a light shining in your eyes. What can I do for you?

0831180407002949--.name: I haven't been everywhere I want to go yet.

0831180407002950--.name: I go wherever my feet may take me.

0831180407002951--.name: Hey there, young $male:fellow,female:lady$. You look like a traveler. I hope you're making the most of your youth and seeing the world.

0831180407002952--.name: Eh? What in the world is going on?

0831180407002953--.name: I want to do something fun...

0831180407002954--.name: What can I do for fun today?

0831180407002955--.name: What if time never starts flowing again?

0831180407002957--.name: I don't think I'm dreaming anymore.

0831180407002958--.name: I've had enough of all these monsters!

0831180407002959--.name: Strange... I see cake everywhere, but I smell nothing.

0831180407002961--.name: Is there something you're looking for? You can find everything at Cathy Mart. If we don't have it, it doesn't exist!

0831180407002962--.name: Do you have something to say to me?

0831180407002963--.name: It won't be easy to survive here.

0831180407002964--.name: Do you have business with me?

0831180407002965--.name: $MyPCName$, never let your guard down. Not for an instant. You're a long way from Maple World.

0831180407002967--.name: Can I ever get out of here?

0831180407002968--.name: I don't care who you are. Just stop talking to me. They'll beat me up if they see me talking to you.

0831180407002969--.name: Is there something you want from me?

0831180407002971--.name: I'll rule the world with my Baba powder.

0831180407002972--.name: So, you want to know where $item:20000046$ came from? Sure, I'll tell you. It's not like I have any reason to hide it now.

0831180407002973--.name: While I was making supplements in a corner of Goldus's drug factory, I accidentally came across a sample of $item:20000102$, a natural stimulant.

0831180407002974--.name: When ingested, this chemical heightens one's mood, relaxes their mind, and also gives an energy boost. The empire prohibited its use simply because it's produced in the Land of Darkness. All that did was drive the trade underground!

0831180407002977--.name: The Cruel Tower is like a living hell. I don't even want to think about it. I'm lucky to have gotten out of there alive.

0831180407002985--.name: Ah... I want to go home...

0831180407002986--.name: $MyPCName$, I don't know how to repay you and the Lumina Liberation Army for this. Thank you so much.

0831180407003018--.name: They're not going to take me away again... Are they?

0831180407003019--.name: My skin is still crawling... Can I ever go back home?

0831180407003044--.name: Whew, I wish I had more hands.

0831180407003045--.name: Chin up! You can do anything!

0831180407003046--.name: There's no better medicine than hope. Stop being a crybaby and come over here.

0831180407003048--.name: Eesh... What do I do now?

0831180407003050--.name: Ooh, I hate wolves more than anything. They chew up our fences and take our sheep. I wish I could just move away... me and the sheep...

0831180407003053--.name: Unnggh... I can't hold it much longer...

0831180407003054--.name: Take your time and have a look around.

0831180407003055--.name: When is the next shift going to show up? I really have to go to the bathroom! ...Oh, shoot! Please excuse me, um, how may I help you?

0831180407003056--.name: You can pay for your items at the cashier over there.

0831180407003057--.name: Cathy Mart sells only the highest-quality products. If you find any items that don't seem to meet our standards, please don't hesitate to let me know.

0831180407003064--.name: Shush, I'm on a mission right now. Please don't interrupt me.

0831180407003066--.name: He's up to something. I know it.

0831180407003067--.name: Even the slipperiest suspect can't escape from me once I set my sights on them.

0831180407003070--.name: We must cover all the bases...

0831180407003072--.name: Do you know who $npcName:11000614[gender:0]$ is? He's a friend of mine in $map:03000135$.

0831180407003073--.name: We first met in Katramus. The Lumina Liberation Army sprung us while we were being transferred to another prison, and we joined up together.

0831180407003074--.name: We promised that we'd stick together like we did during our time in prison. That was the most difficult time of our lives.

0831180407003078--.name: But why does it have to be now? Sigh...

0831180407003079--.name: I think that doctor is a quack. The more he treats me, the worse I feel. Sigh...

0831180407003083--.name: Ah, I don't care about justice or world peace. I just don't like it when people bully the weak. No one has the right to make others suffer, no matter how strong they are.

0831180407003087--.name: This is beyond bad! $npcName:22400062$ is trying to manipulate the timeline to his own ends! If he succeeds, the resulting temporal cascade will wipe away all of history as we know it!

0831180407003088--.name: This place exists upon the central axis of time for our universe. It is a road to all things. Here all possible timelines coexist simultaneously. $npcName:22400062$ plans to collapse them all into a single eventuality, one where he reigns supreme!

0831180407003096--.name: We have to protect the Lapenta of Time...

0831180407003097--.name: I know we'll succeed... Won't we?

0831180407003100--.name: Who would have thought something like this could ever happen?

0831180407003101--.name: I don't think it's coincidence that I landed here.

0831180407003102--.name: I believe more than one timeline exists in Ludibrium at this moment.

0831180407003103--.name: What is it? I'm doing something really important. Please don't distract me.

0831180407003106--.name: The world keeps changing, and our technology and science leads the way. Mark my words, I'll usher in a new era with my work.

0831180407003108--.name: Maybe the time machine worked too well.

0831180407003109--.name: I shouldn't change anything in the period I'm visiting.

0831180407003110--.name: It's snowing here. How amazing! You understand why, right?

0831180407003111--.name: I can think. I can assess.

0831180407003114--.name: Robots are no longer tools. We are capable of much more than our creators.

0831180407003115--.name: I'm not doing this because I want to.

0831180407003116--.name: I'm hiding, and yet I feel like everyone can see me.

0831180407003117--.name: Ah... How did things go so wrong?

0831180407003122--.name: Whew... What should I do next?

0831180407003123--.name: I also have to fix the fence...

0831180407003124--.name: Our sheep must be hiding somewhere...

0831180407003125--.name: The w-wolves showed up again... They destroyed our fence, and some of our sheep were so scared that they ran into that thicket.

0831180407003126--.name: But an $npcName:24000702$ carried off $npcName:11001013[gender:1]$'s $item:30000328$ in its jaws...

0831180407003133--.name: Feel free to take a look around.

0831180407003136--.name: Sigh... I'm losing my customers to that supermarket...

0831180407003137--.name: Bugs love delicious fruit. Just look at all these flies in my shop! That should tell you how sweet my fruit is.

0831180407003138--.name: My prices are lower than any supermarket's. Here, come try some samples.

0831180407003140--.name: The more I think about it, the angrier I get!

0831180407003141--.name: Are they doing this to me because I'm an intern? I didn't become a researcher to run errands!

0831180407003143--.name: There's got to be a reason... What is it?

0831180407003144--.name: Please don't be too loud. I can't afford any distractions from my research.

0105003907007695-NPCPortal01-.name: I hope this portal won't disrupt local space-time.

0831180407003147--.name: Isn't this incredible? Frozen in time...

0831180407003150--.name: $MyPCName$, would you like to know what's going on here? You look a little... bewildered.

0831180407003151--.name: What? Do you have something to say to me?

0831180407003152--.name: This place is more dangerous than you think. Don't do anything stupid.

0831180407003153--.name: Every time I think I found a clue, it turns out to be nothing.

0831180407003154--.name: Don't rely on Fairy Dew too much. This place is teeming with monsters that are stronger than you.

0831180407003156--.name: The world looks more interesting when I see it through a telescope.

0831180407003157--.name: When I'm curious about something, I can't stop thinking about it.

0831180407003158--.name: I've got this awful, creeping feeling that something bad is coming. I really hope I'm wrong.

0831180407003160--.name: People try to put us down, talking about my generation...

0831180407003161--.name: Old man, look at my life. I'm a lot like you were...

0831180407003162--.name: Who's going to scratch my back later?

0831180407003163--.name: I think all the hair that should've gone to my head went to my chin.

0831180407003164--.name: Ugh, why do I feel so bloated?

0831180407003165--.name: I don't know if I could handle seeing something like that again. It was surreal, horrifying, futile...

0831180407003167--.name: Are you new to $map:02000111$? Because most people who live here know what I'm talking about. It was the $npcName:23000017$ Tsunami.

0831180407003169--.name: That happened way back when I still had a full head of hair. It was January 23rd, around 11 p.m. The cold, merciless wind was churning the sea when the legendary turtle king $npcName:23000017$ awoke and rose to the ocean's surface from his briny domain.

0831180407003170--.name: I've never seen such a massive, terrifying creature in my whole life. And it was fast. I couldn't believe it was a turtle.

0831180407003171--.name: Anyway, the news of the legendary turtle king surfacing quickly spread, and great warriors came from all over Maple World to battle back the deadliest turtle in history. Ahhh, just recalling that day makes my nonexistent hair stand on end.

0831180407003172--.name: A single strike from that turtle's leg sent dozens of warriors flying. Some of them were terrified into running. But enough brave souls stuck it out to tire the turtle out. For awhile, it looked like we might come out on top.

0831180407003173--.name: It must have been an hour into the battle, when suddenly a loud roar came up from the sea. The next thing I remember is someone screaming about a tsunami coming.

0831180407003174--.name: In an instant, a wave tall enough to block out the sun rose up. The warriors had to finish the fight and warn everyone else to escape before all was lost.

0831180407003175--.name: Acting as a team, the warriors came together and pressed back against $npcName:23000017$ twice as hard. It was the most intense battle I've ever seen.

0831180407003176--.name: I'll never forget the moment they finally flipped $npcName:23000017$ over. It was an incredible victory, cut short by the massive tsunami crashing down on us!

0831180407003177--.name: I don't know how long I was out. When I woke up, the sky was clear and the sea was quiet, as if the terror of the previous night was but a dream. It might as well be for those warriors... for they and $npcName:23000017$ were all swept out to sea.

0831180407003178--.name: What was perhaps the most frenzied battle in history was lost to the tides, with only myself and a few other survivors to retell the story.

0831180407003179--.name: $npcName:23000017$ has never returned to bother us since that day. I don't know if the tsunami swept it away, or if our heroes taught it a lesson.

0831180407003180--.name: I've been studying turtles in the hopes of finding a clue to where their king went. And now, with my bald head and hunched-up shoulders and craning neck, I almost look like a turtle myself. Heh.

0831180407003181--.name: I'm going to be rich soon.

0831180407003183--.name: What am I going to do when I become rich? Well... I want a nice-looking house, a nice-looking car, nice-looking clothes, nice-looking shoes... Basically, everything I have should look nice. Right?

0831180407003184--.name: Do you know how the fairfolk greet each other?

0831180407003185--.name: Mm, I love this fresh forest scent!

0831180407003186--.name: Forests are the cradle of life for woodland creatures like us fairfolk. If they get cut down, we'll fall with them.

0831180407003190--.name: Don't you? You're broke, aren't you? If you find $itemPlural:30000193$, don't waste them on useless things. Bring them to me.

0831180407003191--.name: What can you give me for $itemPlural:30000193$?

0831180407003193--.name: I can help you become stronger more quickly than any hunting you could do. I'm not just talking about equipment, either. With my help, you can become even mightier than before.

0831180407003194--.name: That's got to be more appealing than just buying a new sword or whatever with your $itemPlural:30000193$, right? Think about what's going to help you the most.

0831180407003195--.name: I'm not just talking about a couple of $itemPlural:30000193$, though. You're going to need a couple dozen or maybe a hundred if you want my help. Got it?

0831180407003196--.name: That's none of your business. Bring me at least 10 $itemPlural:30000193$, and we'll talk.

0831180407003200--.name: Nice, nice. I'll make sure these $itemPlural:30000193$ go to a good cause. See you around.

0831180407003201--.name: What? You punk, how dare you try to cheat me out of my $itemPlural:30000193$? Get out of my sight!

0831180407003202--.name: Nice, nice. I'll make sure these $itemPlural:30000193$ go to a good cause. See you around.

0831180407003203--.name: What? You punk, how dare you try to cheat me out of my $itemPlural:30000193$? Get out of my sight!

0831180407003207--.name: Don't you? You're broke, aren't you? If you find $itemPlural:30000193$, don't waste them on useless things. Bring them to me.

0831180407003208--.name: What can you give me for $itemPlural:30000193$?

0831180407003210--.name: I can help you become stronger more quickly than any hunting you could do. I'm not just talking about equipment, either. With my help, you can become even mightier than before.

0831180407003211--.name: That's got to be more appealing than just buying a new sword or whatever with your $itemPlural:30000193$, right? Think about what's going to help you the most.

0831180407003212--.name: I'm not just talking about a couple of $itemPlural:30000193$, though. You're going to need a couple dozen or maybe a hundred if you want my help. Got it?

0831180407003213--.name: That's none of your business. Bring me at least 10 $itemPlural:30000193$, and we'll talk.

0831180407003217--.name: Nice, nice. I'll make sure these $itemPlural:30000193$ go to a good cause. See you around.

0831180407003218--.name: What? You punk, how dare you try to cheat me out of my $itemPlural:30000193$? Get out of my sight!

0831180407003219--.name: Nice, nice. I'll make sure these $itemPlural:30000193$ go to a good cause. See you around.
