0318211907005955--.name: Don't let it get to you, my downtrodden dancer. Even if you're eliminated, there's a special dance floor where you can strut yourself. Just go to the yellow stage and press the action key!

0318211907005956--.name: What's the secret to winning the game?

0318211907005958--.name: Making music isn't the only thing I love, yo. Listening to great jams and partying with my people are high on the list.

0318211907005959--.name: Dance and play! It's not hard if you're having fun.

0318211907005960--.name: I'll teach you how to play.

0318211907005963--.name: Dance and play! It's not hard if you're having fun.

0318211907005964--.name: How do you play Dance, Dance, Stop?

0318211907005965--.name: I got eliminated. It's not fair!

0318211907005967--.name: When the numbers appear on the floor panels, hop on them! If you match the number of dancers to the number, you go on to the next round. Otherwise... you're out!

0318211907005969--.name: I don't know how to dance.

0318211907005970--.name: Last 5 rounds, and you win. But the longer the game goes on, the less time you have to get on a panel. If you're a quick thinker and a fast runner, you can win... even if you're a terrible dancer!

0318211907005973--.name: You know I do! Dancing isn't just fun—it's a great way to get experience. Once you're on a tile for 2 or more dancers, you can block others from joining you. This is a great way to lock down a tricky number and get a fabulous bonus.

0318211907005974--.name: Just press the action key to block others from joining your panel. You can't leave the tile while you're doing this, so when you're done be sure to press the action key again. But the most important tip I have... is to have fun!

0318211907005976--.name: That's the spirit! Keep it real, my friend. Keep it real.

0318211907005977--.name: Don't even sweat it. Just press the yellow light on the floor, and bam! It's dance time! Press the action key to boogie down with some random dance moves.

0318211907005980--.name: Don't let it get to you, my downtrodden dancer. Even if you're eliminated, there's a special dance floor where you can strut yourself. Just go to the yellow stage and press the action key!

0318211907005981--.name: What's the secret to winning the game?

0318211907005983--.name: The best way to know how someone really feels is to watch him dance. I learn so much about human emotion by studying the dancers here.

0323002607005988--.name: A lovely day for some exercise, don't you think? One-two, one-two!

0323002607005989--.name: One, two, three, four! Feel that stretch in your joints! Two, two! Three, four!

0323002607005990--.name: My back... Maybe I should take five.

0323002607005991--.name: The air is so bracing out here! Care to join me?

0323002607005992--.name: I, um... I like your hat.

0323002607005993--.name: Aren't you a darling? I hear this is the hottest design in $map:02010002$ nowadays! My brother, $npcName:11000167[gender:0]$, picked it up for me.

0323002607005994--.name: You're lucky to have such a great brother.

0323002607005995--.name: Don't I know it! He always looks out for me, even when he's off in the field. But lately, he hasn't been himself. Not since he had to give up hunting.

0323002607005997--.name: His wife hates it. She got sick of him coming home with all manner of wounds. Of course I worry about him, too, but this is his calling. A man can't be happy if he can't follow his calling.

0323002607005998--.name: Doesn't matter what I think, of course. $npcName:11000167[gender:0]$ agreed to stop hunting and go into business in $map:02000036$. He seems awful miserable to me, but what do I know? I'm just his sister.

0322222107005987--.name: I didn't come all the way out here for nothing...

0329103507006003--.name: Why can't love be simple for once?

0329103507006004--.name:
I cannot help but sigh...
<font color="#909090">She sighs.</font>

0531170907006223-Striker-.name: Hey! You know why they call me $npc:11001545[gender:0]$?

0531170907006225-Striker-.name: 'Cause I'm so great I deserve a standing ovation! Haha! I can't believe you never heard of me. Anyway, you need anything, you just call out my name. Not that I'll come running, but maybe it'll give you good luck.

0607145407006336-Striker-.name: Well what're you staring at? Did'ja have something to tell me, or do you just like the view?

0516130207006114-Striker-.name: What're you looking at? You got something to say?

0531170907006246-Striker-.name: Go back to your corner and practice. I'm busy.

0531170907006249-Striker-.name: The idiots here have big mouths. Well go on, what did they tell you?

0531170907006251-Striker-.name: Strength is relative. If these idiots think I'm strong, it's only because they've never faced true power.

0531170907006252-Striker-.name: I know a thing or two about strength.

0531170907006253-Striker-.name: I see. If you're that confident, maybe you'll present an actual challenge.

0531170907006254-Striker-.name: Not everyone is so quick to believe me.

0531170907006255-Striker-.name: This one time, I had a match against this bird-man who was on a journey to test his strength. He didn't look much—heck, he looked weaker than most. Nobody took him seriously.

0531170907006256-Striker-.name: But when he stepped into that ring, he tore through his opponents like they were made of paper. Even I couldn't do better than draw against him. He taught me not to judge a book by its cover.

0531170907006257-Striker-.name: You think I'm like that bird guy?

0531170907006258-Striker-.name: Hah! No, if anything, you're more like me. There's a certain electricity in the air around fighters like you and I. Most people can't even sense it. But the strong can always recognize each other.

0531170907006260-Striker-.name: Of course, you can also be strong without knowing how to fight. The only way to really know someone is to face them in the ring. I don't know about you, but I'm looking forward to our fight. (The air around him grows heavy and terrifying.)

0629000607006395-Striker-.name: What seems to be the problem?

0629000607006396-Striker-.name: I've got nothing to say to you.

0421104907006038--.name: We'll make sashimi and put the leftovers in a stew.

0421104907006039--.name: Are you here to fish? This place is wonderful. I came here with my sister, Bory, and we're having a blast!

0421104907006040--.name: Maybe I should have used more sunscreen...

0421104907006041--.name: These fish better not be stealing my bait and swimming off.

0421104907006042--.name: $npcName:11001553[gender:0]$, I'm hungry. Can't we just buy some snacks?

0421104907006043--.name: I should've worn a wide-brimmed hat today. This sun is killing me.

0421104907006044--.name: Did he just put something in his pocket? No, couldn't be...

0421104907006045--.name: If he wants to come back, fine. I'm not dragging him back...

0421104907006046--.name: He'd better study hard if he wants to pass the test.

0421104907006047--.name: Tsk. If people keep taking pebbles home as souvenirs, soon the beach will be completely bare.

0421104907006048--.name: This one time, somebody climbed the hill in the middle of the night to get up close to the whale. Or he tried to, but he lost his grip halfway up and fell. It was a total disaster.

0617105607006360-SoulBinder-.name: Our minds and bodies follow each other in harmony. Consider, the truly wise speak with wisdom, and also act with wisdom.

0727223007006788-SoulBinder-.name: At last... The prophecy comes to pass...

0727223007006789-SoulBinder-.name: The long night descends upon us...

0727223007006792-SoulBinder-.name: Indeed. Your training has brought you to an important crossroad. According to our traditions, it is time for you to set out on a journey to test your skills in the outside world.

0727223007006793-SoulBinder-.name: However, the presence of this terrible darkness must be dealt with first. We can discuss your training later.

0617105607006361-SoulBinder-.name: Have you been training? Answer carefully.

0727223007006794-SoulBinder-.name: There are three secrets to unbeatable strength: training, training, and training.

0727223007006795-SoulBinder-.name: Train as if there is no tomorrow. If you don't, then there may not be.

0727223007006797-SoulBinder-.name: I want to know the secrets of animus.

0727223007006798-SoulBinder-.name: Tell me about last year's incident.

0727223007006799-SoulBinder-.name: Why aren't there more students of Guidance?

0727223007006800-SoulBinder-.name: Knowledge is just as important as strength. For that reason, I will answer your questions, no matter how stupid they are. Don't make me repeat myself.

0727223007006801-SoulBinder-.name: Animus is both the core philosophy and the energy developed by the Lone Spirit, who founded our order long ago. When you become one with nature, you can harness this energy and turn it into martial power.

0727223007006802-SoulBinder-.name:
The outsiders wield a similar force that they call magic. Animus is more powerful, of course, but it takes years of dedicated training to master.
<font color="#909090">(He eyes you coolly.)</font>

0727223007006803-SoulBinder-.name: The master and I were traveling the Land of Darkness on a training journey when we heard a series of explosions. We followed the sound and found you, dying.

0727233607006913-SoulBinder-.name: I didn't even realize you were alive at first, you were so close to death. The master tried to cure you, but you were too far gone.

0727223007006804-SoulBinder-.name: The master refused to let you die. He channeled his animus into you so that you would live. Do you understand what that means?

0727223007006807-SoulBinder-.name: If you don't understand your roots, you will never know wisdom. If you don't show gratitude, you will never know humanity. And you... You know neither. So just listen and nod.

0727223007006808-SoulBinder-.name: I begged him not to, but he gave you a portion of his power. He didn't simply heal you... he transferred his animus into you. Animus developed over centuries of training.

0727223007006809-SoulBinder-.name: I don't understand why the master was so determined to save you, but your life is his now. The only way to repay him is to train as hard as you can and become a great student of Guidance.

0727223007006810-SoulBinder-.name: If you knew that, maybe you wouldn't have slacked off in your training so much! Did you really think I wouldn't notice? You need to put your all into it!

0727223007006811-SoulBinder-.name: There is only you, myself, and $npcName:11001699[gender:1]$. Does it bother you that there are only three of us?

0727223007006812-SoulBinder-.name: When I joined Guidance, there were quite a few students. In its heyday, the mountain was teeming with them.

0727223007006814-SoulBinder-.name: They left for various reasons. Some thought the training was too hard. Others left to join the world of humans after their training journey. A few only wanted to learn some simple tricks, and left as soon as they'd done so.

0727223007006815-SoulBinder-.name: A few of our former students created their own group in the outside world. If they couldn't make it here, I doubt they'd have much success on their own. They certainly wouldn't hold to our values of integrity and righteousness...

0727223007006816-SoulBinder-.name: What did they call themselves? The Blackwinds? The Jaw Smashers? Something insane like that. Let their mistakes be a reminder to stay on the path of training.

0727223007006817-SoulBinder-.name: Nothing like slipping away to my room for a little rest!

0727223007006818-SoulBinder-.name: If I go outside, $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ will make me train more...

0727223007006819-SoulBinder-.name: What do you need? Maybe I can help.

0727223007006821-SoulBinder-.name: I want to know more about Guidance.

0727223007006824-SoulBinder-.name: That would explain all the mumbling. It wasn't... the dream, was it?

0727223007006825-SoulBinder-.name: No... It was different this time...

0727223007006826-SoulBinder-.name: That's a relief! I think I'd go crazy if I kept having nightmares about being chased by some mysterious figure.

0727223007006827-SoulBinder-.name: I dreamed about the first time I met the master and $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$.

0727223007006828-SoulBinder-.name: That's the earliest memory you have, isn't it? It must have made a real impression! And why not? The first time I met you also left an impression.

0727223007006829-SoulBinder-.name: Not a bad impression, I hope!

0727223007006830-SoulBinder-.name: No, no, not bad, just... startling. The members of Guidance have always been animal folk, at least until you came along. I never expected to see the master and $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ return to Halo Mountain with a bloodied human in tow.

0727223007006831-SoulBinder-.name: I was sure the master would boot you back out as soon as you were walking again. Instead, he took you on as his student. $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ sure wasn't happy about that...

0727223007006832-SoulBinder-.name: For thousands of years, Guidance only ever accepted animal folk into its fold. It was specifically founded by the great Lone Spirit to help us reach enlightenment.

0727223007006833-SoulBinder-.name: But that was long ago, and the Lone Spirit's philosophy has surely evolved over millenia of teaching and study. Besides, Halo Mountain is practically empty now, so I say it's time we started accepting more members... including humans like you.

0727223007006834-SoulBinder-.name: Before you came along, it was just the master, $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$, and me. But with you, we're now a happy family of four.

0727223007006835-SoulBinder-.name: Where did all the students go?

0727223007006836-SoulBinder-.name: Some finished their training and left with the master's blessing. Some left to live with the humans. But most of them couldn't handle the training and gave up.

0727223007006837-SoulBinder-.name: Regardless of the reasons, we still consider all of them members of Guidance. Well, almost all of them. Some of them started their own group devoted to money and power, not enlightenment. We're not on good terms.

0727223007006838-SoulBinder-.name: Half a day, maybe? $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ was pretty moody about it, since it's the second time you've fainted on us. He just needs to have more patience with your human stamina, if you ask me.

0727223007006839-SoulBinder-.name: I don't mind. Taking care of you gives me the chance to relax here and do my antlers. These fairy sparkles take time to get right, y'know. Hey, you want me to do yours? We've got time... if you leave now, then we both have to get back to training...

0727223007006841-SoulBinder-.name: Oh, all right. Guess I can't sit around here all day.

0727223007006842-SoulBinder-.name: Why do you think I fainted?

0727223007006843-SoulBinder-.name: It must be the animus that the master breathed into you. I've never heard of a human using animus before you, so it makes sense it would be hard on your squishy, furless body. Besides, the master's animus is potent even for us animal folk.

0727223007006844-SoulBinder-.name: You have a great power inside you, but you're not strong enough to control it. I imagine that feels pretty rough now and then.

0727223007006845-SoulBinder-.name: I want to know the secrets of animus.

0727223007006846-SoulBinder-.name: There's nothing secret about it, really. All you have to do is reach unity with nature by disciplining your mind and body, and then harness the energy that creates. The trick is actually doing any of that.

0727223007006847-SoulBinder-.name: I'm sure $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ would be happy to tell you all about it during training.

0727223007006848-SoulBinder-.name: Master $npcName:11001556[gender:0]$ is our teacher and the leader of Guidance. He is the fifteenth master to hold the title of Munakra, which means "seeker of knowledge."

0727223007006850-SoulBinder-.name: The Lone Spirit led Guidance for hundreds of years before he vanished. When the time came, he chose the wisest of his students and bestowed upon them the title of Munakra.

0727223007006851-SoulBinder-.name: Since then, the wisest student of each generation receives the title and becomes Guidance's new leader. Our master is the fifteenth in that line. And even if we're pretty small now, we still stand thanks to his leadership.

0727223007006852-SoulBinder-.name: The master makes a yearly pilgrimage to the outside world to help the needy and fight evil. He does it all in secret, too. I think he's done more to help Maple World than any of the Munakra who led Guidance before him.

0515180307006107--.name: I'm sorry I didn't stay in touch. I couldn't find the time. Still, it seems you did well enough without me.

0515180307006108--.name: No matter $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$'s reasons or excuses, I will never forgive him for murdering Arazaad.

0515180307006109--.name: Wake up, $npcName:11001233[gender:1]$. We still need to avenge Arazaad...

0515180307006110--.name: I'll be back on my feet... before you know it...

0524142307006211--.name: Don't worry about me... I'll be back on my feet in no time...

0515180307006111--.name: We can't give up yet. There's still so much to do!

0524142307006212--.name: We can't give up yet. There's still too much to do!

0504151707006058--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0515180307006113--.name: The bond between our ancestors makes us strong. I couldn't be more grateful.

0515180307006114--.name: $MyPCName$, remember: no one crosses paths by accident. Be kind to everyone you meet, no matter how insignificant they may seem at the time.

0524142307006213--.name: The bond between our ancestors makes us strong. I couldn't be more grateful.

0515180307006115--.name: I shall help you however I can.

0515180307006116--.name: The life force will protect everyone.

0515180307006117--.name: I'll be back on my feet... before you know it...

0524142307006214--.name: Don't worry about me... I'll be back on my feet in no time...

0515180307006118--.name: I think everyone... will be all right...

0515180307006119--.name: We just need to pray for a miracle...

0515180307006121--.name: This is not going to be easy.

0524142307006215--.name: This is not going to be easy.

0515180307006122--.name: This is not going to be easy.

0504151707006071--.name: Do you have business with me?

0504151707006073--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0515180307006123--.name: There must be something about the power $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$  seeks in our ancestors' records.

0515180307006125--.name: I encountered Holstatt in the Land of Darkness once. He said that Arazaad had kept a secret from us. That the real legacy of our ancestors was elsewhere.

0515180307006126--.name: I don't know if he was lying or not. But if he wasn't, then the old records, which only Arazaad could read, must hold clue about the secret. Something to point us towards this so-called legacy.

0517210007006136--.name: Why are you staring at me?

0517210007006137--.name: I just wanted to see you.

0517210007006140--.name: There's something I need to tell you.

0517210007006142--.name: Y-you did? So did I. Ahem.

0517210007006143--.name: Now is not the time for such things!

0517210007006144--.name: I'm a little busy right now.

0524142307006216--.name: There must be something about the power $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ seeks in our ancestors' records.

0524142307006218--.name: I encountered Holstatt in the Land of Darkness once. He said that Arazaad had kept a secret from us. That the real legacy of our ancestors was elsewhere.

0524142307006219--.name: I don't know if he was lying or not. But if he wasn't, then the old records, which only Arazaad could read, must hold some clue about the secret. Something to point us towards this so-called legacy.

0515180307006127--.name: Can we ever go back to Calibre Island?

0515180307006128--.name: We have gathered here for one cause. Together, we can do anything.

0515180307006129--.name: No words can express my gratitude. I only hope that I can repay the empire one day.

0517210007006145--.name: Why are you staring at me?

0517210007006146--.name: I just wanted to see you.

0517210007006149--.name: There's something I need to tell you.

0517210007006151--.name: Y-you did? So did I. Ahem.

0517210007006152--.name: Now is not the time for such things!

0517210007006153--.name: I'm a little busy right now.

0524142307006220--.name: No words can express my gratitude. I only hope that I can repay the empire one day.

0515180307006130--.name: $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ is strong. He'll recover. Until then, the Life Lapenta will protect him.

0515180307006131--.name: $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ can't keep this up for long. It's only a matter of time before we have our revenge.

0524142307006221--.name: $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ can't keep this up for long. It's only a matter of time before we have our revenge.

0515180307006132--.name: $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$'s body may be asleep, but I don't think his mind is. He'll return to us soon.

0515180307006133--.name: This isn't like $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ at all. Wake up!

0524142307006222--.name: This isn't like $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ at all. Wake up!

0515180307006134--.name: This is all my doing. I should have stayed out of $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$'s way...

0515180307006136--.name: Everyone seems to be a little heated. Don't forget, this is official Expedition business.

0504151707006089--.name: Do you have business with me?

0515180307006138--.name: The real fun is about to begin! I'm going to blow that $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ guy to smithereens!

0515180307006139--.name: Enough with the preamble. It's time for the main event.

0504151707006092--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0515180307006141--.name: We've agreed to accept each other as comrades. That means we must trust and respect one another.

0515180307006142--.name: The sooner this is over with, the sooner I can go back to Calibre Island.

0515180307006143--.name: Has the time finally come time to avenge Arazaad? $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$... I'll make you pay!

0515180307006144--.name: We've joined forces under the banner of the Starlight Expedition. I only hope we can achieve what we've set out to do.

0511194807006105--.name: I miss the master. I still hear his voice in my head...

0531170907006264-Striker-.name: You have something to say to me?

0531170907006265-Striker-.name: The people your thugs took, are they safe?

0531170907006266-Striker-.name: Who knows? The poor idiots are probably locked up somewhere. They don't respect the first rule of the streets: you give back as much as you take. Blackstar wants to make 'em pay up their fair share, that's all.

0531170907006267-Striker-.name: Why do you care, anyway? You friends with one of those vagrants?

0531170907006268-Striker-.name: Their friends asked me to look into their disappearances.

0531170907006269-Striker-.name: Sticking your nose into matters that don't concern you, eh? That's a special kind of stupid. I'd say they better be paying you a fortune, but any friend of those deadbeats wouldn't have two mesos to rub together.

0531170907006270-Striker-.name: I'm not in this for the money.

0531170907006271-Striker-.name:
<font color="#909090">($npc:11001623[gender:0]$ squints at you in disbelief.)</font>
You don't know them and you don't care about getting paid?

0531170907006272-Striker-.name: You're one of those hero-types. That's fine with me. Go off and get yourself killed. One less idiot to get in my way.

0531170907006273-Striker-.name: Was there something you wanted to ask me?

0531170907006274-Striker-.name: Tell me about the champion of $map:63000020$.

0531170907006275-Striker-.name: $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ is the champion and public face of $map:63000020$. Over the course of his career here, he's had 47 wins, zero losses, and one tie.

0531170907006276-Striker-.name: His fights always end the same way: a single punch and his opponent is out like a light. He's built like a tank and moves like a panther. It's no wonder the crowds love him.

0531170907006278-Striker-.name: Yes, he tied. Once. His opponent wasn't even human—it was one of those animal men. He used a very strange technique in the ring. It almost looked like magic.

0531170907006279-Striker-.name: $map:63000020$ had never seen anything like him, and we haven't again since. Even $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ was impressed.

0531170907006280-Striker-.name: The challenger left as soon as the match was over, mumbling something about being "pleased with the results of his training." What was his name again...?

0531173507006320-Striker-.name: Ah, that's right! The challenger's name was Junta. And that's everything I know about him.

0516130207006126-Striker-.name: You got something to say to me?

0531170907006281-Striker-.name: I'm looking forward to today's match.

0531170907006282-Striker-.name: What makes you so sure $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$'s going to win?

0531170907006283-Striker-.name: I'm not. Anything can happen in the ring. But I know $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$, and I know that he never fails me.

0531170907006284-Striker-.name: That's because he's never faced me in the ring.

0531170907006285-Striker-.name: Is that so? Okay. Let's see if your fists can back up your words.

0531170907006288-Striker-.name: Not that I think you'll believe me, but no, I didn't. Even if I did know, so what? It's not my job to stop him.

0531170907006290-Striker-.name: Listen. My old man and I don't always see eye to eye, but he built Blackstar from the ground up. You gotta be ruthless to succeed in this town, and he's earned my respect.

0531170907006292-Striker-.name: I didn't tell you? Must've slipped my mind. $npcName:11001630[gender:0]$, son of $npcName:11001629[gender:0]$, at your service.

0531170907006294-Striker-.name: Hey, where's it written that I have to tell every idiot who stumbles in here who my dad is? Now, get out of my face before I get mad.

0531170907006296-Striker-.name: Me neither. I got a feeling we'll be fighting again real soon. And next time, I'll beat you fair and square. No tricks.

0531170907006297-Striker-.name: I'll see you in the ring.

0629205207006505-Striker-.name: The moment you step out of here, you're a marked $male:man,female:woman$. Capisce?

0629205207006506-Striker-.name: I have no clue what you're talking about.

0629205207006507-Striker-.name: That's fine. You go about your business. You leave the thinking to me.

0630212007006533-Striker-.name: You better be careful. We're watching you.

0531170907006305-Striker-.name: It's going to take forever to clean up this mess!

0531170907006307-Striker-.name: Did $male:he,female:she$ really shatter this marble with $male:his,female:her$ bare fists?

0531170907006308-Striker-.name: Who, or WHAT could take down our guys so easily?

0531170907006309-Striker-.name: Idiots. Gangsters should be giving beatings, not taking them!

0531170907006313-Striker-.name: He said it was in locker 4...

0531170907006315-Striker-.name: There's gotta be something I can salvage here.

0531170907006318-Striker-.name: They should have contacted me by now...

0630142807006512-Striker-.name: What's taking him so long...? Huh? What do you want?!

0630142807006514-Striker-.name: Wh-what do you think? I'm sorting junk, that's what!

0630142807006516-Striker-.name: I-I'm not up to anything bad. Really. I'm just...

0630142807006519-Striker-.name: You're the Gray Wolf! I was there when you took down those Blackstar goons in $map:02000138$.

0630142807006521-Striker-.name: No, I'm not. You trying to stay off the radar? I would, too, if I had as many enemies as you. But your face has been burned into my brain ever since that day.

0630142807006523-Striker-.name: Anyway, what are you doing here?

0630142807006525-Striker-.name: Here? You and the Blackstars are mortal enemies now, right? Wait... you didn't come here to take them on at their headquarters, did you?

0630142807006526-Striker-.name: Things... got a little out of control.

0630142807006527-Striker-.name: Y-you really are the terror of $map:02000138$! The equal of a hundred warriors! Y'know, I used to think you were just another thug... Since you're here, maybe there's a question you can answer for me.

0630142807006528-Striker-.name: I have a, uh, "friend" who went inside their headquarters. He should have been able to sneak out while you kept the gangsters busy, but he's still missing. You didn't see anyone... suspicious when you were there, did you?

0630142807006530-Striker-.name: Yeah, yeah, good point. Ha, I almost feel sorry for the Blackstars, having an enemy like you. Hahaha!

0630142807006532-Striker-.name: Ha... Ha ha... Ahem. You're a pretty intense $male:guy,female:gal$, you know that? I hope we meet again.

0727223007006853-SoulBinder-.name: Maybe I should take a nap...

0727223007006854-SoulBinder-.name: Where in the world did $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ go?

0727223007006855-SoulBinder-.name: Did you see that shadow? I wonder if that was $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ skulking around.

0727223007006857-SoulBinder-.name: Well, I know I saw something! And he has to be around here somewhere.

0727223007006862-SoulBinder-.name:
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001656[gender:1]$ chokes back a tear.)</font>
The master is fine. He... he has to be...

0727223007006863-SoulBinder-.name: I failed to protect Halo Mountain.

0727223007006869-SoulBinder-.name: I doubt we've seen the last of him. His command of animus is unlike anything I've ever seen. And until he returns, I will do everything I can to protect Guidance.

0727223007006870-SoulBinder-.name: I know that we need to evaluate our options carefully... But all I want to do right now is destroy something. I will be deferring to $npcName:11001656[gender:1]$ for now.

0727223007006871-SoulBinder-.name: I've never seen or heard of him before. Strange that the master never mentioned him, but it sounds like this Kandura lost the title of Munakra to him and has held a grudge ever since.

0727223007006872-SoulBinder-.name: The power he wields wasn't pure animus. The darkness tainting it was potent.

0727223007006873-SoulBinder-.name: If I could control my power, I could have...

0727223007006874-SoulBinder-.name: ...saved him? Perhaps. The animus you possess was honed over centuries of training by one of the greatest masters Guidance had ever known.

0727223007006875-SoulBinder-.name: And if the master hadn't given you that animus, he may have had the power to stop this. I always feared something like this would happen...

0727223007006876-SoulBinder-.name: But... I suppose I can no longer humor such thoughts. It is just the three of us now.

0727223007006878-SoulBinder-.name: ...Well, you're his legacy now. Conduct yourself accordingly.

0727223007006880-SoulBinder-.name: Don't misunderstand me. I'm not trying to cheer you up.

0727223007006881-SoulBinder-.name: I don't like you, and I doubt I ever will. But, like it or not, you are my $male:brother,female:sister$ in Guidance. We must work together if we are to overcome our trials.

0617211107006374--.name: You've grown strong, my hero. I look forward to hearing more great tales of your exploits.

0426085907008441--.name: We hope our faith in you is well deserved.

0617211107006376--.name: May the empress favor you always.

0617211107006377--.name: Do not betray our empress's trust.

0617211107006379--.name: The empress has placed her faith in you.

0617211107006380--.name: Your eyes speak volumes about your character, $MyPCName$. I believe I can trust you. We are depending on you to protect the peace of Maple World.

0426090007008441--.name: What does Her Highness see in this stranger...?

0617211107006381--.name: I look forward to hearing more stories of your heroism.

0617211107006382--.name: Please remain steadfast in your efforts to protect peace and justice.

0620231807006385--.name: May Lady Luck smile upon you!

0620231807006387--.name: For one spin of the $npcName:11001654$, you need 3 $itemPlural:30000554$. You'll get 3 $itemPlural:30000554$ in your mailbox every day just for logging in. You'll also get bonus coins as you spend more time in Maple World. And let's not forget that many of our events also award coins for joining in!

0620231807006388--.name: If you have $itemPlural:30000554$ to burn, be sure to come to $map:63000032$!

0620231807006390--.name: What kind of item would you like today?

0620231807006391--.name: Thank you for joining our 1st anniversary event!

0620231807006393--.name: For one spin of the $npcName:11001654$, you need 3 $itemPlural:30000554$. You'll get 3 $itemPlural:30000554$ in your mailbox every day just for logging in. You'll also get bonus coins as you spend more time in Maple World. And let's not forget that many of our events also award coins for joining in!

0620231807006394--.name: If you have $itemPlural:30000554$ to burn, be sure to come to $map:63000032$!

0711210007006721-SoulBinder-.name: You have something to say to me?

0727223007006882-SoulBinder-.name: Whoever they were, I will stop them.

0727223007006884-SoulBinder-.name: If you have something to say, just say it.

0727223007006888-SoulBinder-.name: As I said, I saw one of those creatures while checking on the barrier stones. It led me into a trap, which took time to get myself out of. Do not worry... those who laid the trap will be laying no others.

0727223007006889-SoulBinder-.name: Do not presume to tell me my business! I am the first student of Guidance, and those frail things could hardly lay a... a... whatever they have on me!

0727223007006890-SoulBinder-.name: I have no idea. They aren't of nature, that much is obvious. And they are organized. Someone is behind this...

0711210007006722-SoulBinder-.name: You have something to say to me?

0727223007006891-SoulBinder-.name: Whoever they were, I will stop them.

0727223007006893-SoulBinder-.name: They've pushed us all the way back to $map:63000029$...

0727223007006895-SoulBinder-.name: I thought we could handle this on our own, but there are too many of them. We have no choice but to report the situation to the master. He will know what to do.

0727223007006896-SoulBinder-.name: We shouldn't have let them get to $map:63000029$...

0727223007006897-SoulBinder-.name: Even with $npcName:11001672[gender:0]$ here, this doesn't look good...

0727223007006898-SoulBinder-.name: Now isn't a great time to talk!

0727223007006900-SoulBinder-.name: Whatever they are, they aren't good. Let's focus less on what they are and more on how to stop them.

0629000607006397-Striker-.name: You need anything, you just call out my name. Not that I'll come running, but maybe it'll give you good luck.

0629000607006398-Striker-.name: This place would've been finished by now if the celebrations hadn't been canceled...

0629000607006399-Striker-.name: I'm just happy there's somewhere for me to kick up my feet and relax.

0629000607006400-Striker-.name: Do you have business with me? Hm?

0629000607006402-Striker-.name: What do you know about the $map:52000034$?

0706165507006631-Striker-.name: What happened to the vagrants Blackstar took hostage?

0708181707006654-Striker-.name: How about this. You know why they call me $npcName:11001674[gender:0]$?

0629000607006403-Striker-.name: I'm so great I deserve a standing ovation! Haw! I can't believe you never heard of me. Well, remember me for next time.

0708181707006657-Striker-.name: I heard your real name is Brav-gross.

0629000607006404-Striker-.name: Has somebody been tarnishing my good name? It's $npcName:11001682[gender:0]$, isn't it?

0708181707006658-Striker-.name: Ahem! I don't know where you heard that, but it's a dirty lie. $npcName:11001674[gender:0]$ is my name, and $npcName:11001674[gender:0]$ is who I am. Now get outta here, before you make me mad!

0629000607006405-Striker-.name: You probably already heard this, but listen anyway. They call me Bravos 'cause I'm so great I deserve a standing ovation! Get it?

0708181707006659-Striker-.name: I heard your real name is Brav-gross.

0629000607006406-Striker-.name: Has somebody been tarnishing my good name? It's $npcName:11001682[gender:0]$, isn't it?

0708181707006660-Striker-.name: Ahem! I don't know where you heard that, but it's a dirty lie. $npcName:11001674[gender:0]$ is my name, and $npcName:11001674[gender:0]$ is who I am. Now get outta here, before you make me mad!

0706165507006632-Striker-.name: I don't know, exactly. I heard we were gonna set up a base of operations in $map:02000001$, but there were problems with the construction. Eventually we gave up on the building, and... Well, take a look around you.

0706165507006634-Striker-.name: You really have no idea how big Blackstar is, do you? Every gangster in the underworld is connected to it one way or another. Gray Wolf or not, you can't take it on by yourself.

0708181707006661-Striker-.name: How big is your organization, really?

0708181707006662-Striker-.name: Why do you care? That's none of your business. Now, I'd say that's enough stupid questions out of you.

0708181707006663-Striker-.name: How should I know? It wasn't my operation. I don't even know where they are. I know you made some sorta deal with the boss, but let me give you some advice anyway: don't do anything stupid.

0708181707006664-Striker-.name: What I wanna know is why you're going along with whatever the boss says. A strong fighter like you could take Blackstar for $male:himself,female:herself$ if $male:he,female:she$ wanted. Maybe you just don't have the guts.

0708181707006665-Striker-.name: I'm just afraid for their safety.

0708181707006666-Striker-.name: Yeah, sure you are. And that's the only reason you wanna know?

0708181707006667-Striker-.name: I lost the match. I'm honor bound to work with him.

0708181707006668-Striker-.name: You're a bigger fool than $npcName:11001682[gender:0]$. Well, I guess I can't hold it against you if it means you're working with us instead of against us.

0712221207006726-Striker-.name: You've come to the right man. What do you wanna know?

0712221207006728-Striker-.name: Maybe you didn't know this, but $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ is the boss's son. Heir to the kingdom, though you wouldn't know it to talk to him. All the officers sure seem to like him, though.

0712221207006730-Striker-.name: You ever meet a boss's kid before? You know the type. Throws his daddy's weight around. Makes all the company goons do whatever he says. Well, $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ ain't like that. He doesn't care about power or money. So why wouldn't they like him?

0712221207006731-Striker-.name: And what does the rank-and-file think?

0712221207006732-Striker-.name: $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ is our hero. His pop's the head honcho, but $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ didn't ever get nothing that he didn't earn with his own two fists. A real man's man, you know?

0629000607006417-Striker-.name: You need anything, you just call out my name. Not that I'll come running, but maybe it'll give you good luck.

0704194107006576--.name: Feel free to ask me anything.

0704194107006579--.name: Welcome to $map:02000001$. How may I help you?

0704194107006581--.name: What happened to the empress's celebration?

0704194107006582--.name: Hey there. I'm new in town.

0704194107006584--.name: $map:02000001$ is the biggest city in all of Maple World and the seat of $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$'s power.

0704194107006585--.name: $map:02000025$ watches over the city from the north. It's off-limits to the public, I'm afraid. Her majesty's safety takes priority over the curiosity of tourists.

0704194107006586--.name: The $map:02000188$, the Banners of Glory, and a taxi stop are all conveniently located in the center of the city. For a reasonable fee, you can hire a taxi to take you to any other taxi stop you've visited, you know. Oh, and the job instructors from all over are gathered in the $map:02000188$.

0704194107006587--.name: The Banners of Glory in front of the palace mark the victories of certain powerful guilds and individuals. We update the banners all the time, so you can stop by whenever you like to see who has the most trophies and victories.

0704194107006588--.name: In the northern parts of the city, you'll find the royal office and library. $map:02000031$ is a must-see for any book lover, of course. It's not the biggest library in Maple World, but I like to think that it's the best. When I'm off-duty, I love to wander the stacks.

0704194107006589--.name: Behind the library is a shopping district where you can find special items, anything from home decor to mounts.

0704194107006590--.name: To the southwest, you'll find shops that sell equipment and other supplies. $npcName:11000004[gender:0]$ is one of the best smiths in the land, and $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ sells all the latest herbs and potions. Never pick a fight without a stack of potions, I always say.

0704194107006591--.name: Head southeast and you'll find the residential district and hospital. Kick your feet up and relax after a long journey at $map:02000033$. Have your ailments treated by Tria's finest physician at $map:02000125$. And there's nothing $npcName:11000038[gender:0]$ can't cure.

0704194107006592--.name: And that's $map:02000001$ in a nutshell. A long, wordy nutshell. If I told you everything about the city, you'd be here all night. Is there anything else you want to know?

0704194107006593--.name: I know that you probably came from very far away to see the empress, but these things can't be helped. Thank you for understanding that we had to cancel the open court in the face of unexpected disaster.

0704194107006594--.name: $map:02000001$ is the political, economic, and cultural heart of Maple World, so it's always crowded. But in preparation for open court, there must have been ten times the normal number of people here.

0704194107006595--.name: Of course, when you have so many people in one place, problems are certain to crop up. Thieves, con artists, and the incident at the celebra—Oops. Maybe I shouldn't have said that.

0704194107006596--.name: Anyway, Captain $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ is determined to keep the peace. Enjoy your stay here, and stay out of trouble. For your own sake.

0704194107006611--.name: Everyone in Maple World dreams of having a home to call their own. The empress and her court work tirelessly to open up new plots of land, but there's only so much space, so not many people can have the luxury of owning a magnicifent villa.

0704194107006612--.name: If you don't have a house yet, you should consider $map:02000001$. Property in the city proper is expensive, but the outlying suburb of $map:02000002$ is partially subsidized by the empress. And there's always $map:02000119$... And $map:02000064$...

0704194107006613--.name: There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling $map:02000092$.

0704194107006614--.name: And the merchants in $map:02000036$, west of $map:02000023$, have all kinds of interesting furnishings for sale. Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

0704194107006615--.name: If you already have a house, you could always hire an assistant or two to keep you company. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in the northwestern district of $map:02000001$ hires them out. But first thing's first. You have to buy a house before you can get an assistant!

0704194107006599--.name: Gosh, you're a Knight! I may be a humble guard now, but someday I want to be just like you.

0704194107006600--.name: You know, an old friend of mine left town to become a Berserker. I wonder how he's doing...

0704194107006601--.name: If you're a Wizard, then you'll want to visit $map:02000031$. Even the fairies of $map:02000023$ say our library is the best.

0704194107006602--.name: It is an honor to serve you, Priest. How is the empress doing?

0704194107006603--.name: You're a Green Hood, aren't you? That's great. We guard could use the support of people like you during these crazy times.

0704194107006604--.name: You're a Heavy Gunner, aren't you? I've always wanted to visit $map:2000270$.

0704194107006605--.name: We're watching you, Thief. You are a guest of the kingdom, but we won't abide any criminal activity.

0704194107006606--.name: Know this, Assassin. $map:02000001$ is a city of light.

0704194107006597--.name: If you're looking to take up a job, you should make a stop at the $map:02000188$ in the center of $map:02000001$. Job masters from all over the world are gathered there.

0704194107006598--.name: The timing is pretty lucky for you. If it weren't for the empress's court, they wouldn't be here. Of course, if you aren't at least level 10, they won't even talk to you.

0704194107006607--.name: They say Runeblades are masters of swordsmanship and magic. Being good at either one is hard enough... How did you manage to master both?

0704194107006608-Striker-.name: Hey, you're the Gray Wolf of $map:02000100$, aren't you? They say that you're a master martial artist and that you're taking the fight straight to the gangsters! A real champion of the people! You're my hero! Though... I thought you'd be taller.

0704194107006609-Striker-.name: You've mistaken me for someone else.

0704194107006610-Striker-.name: R-really? I'm sorry. I always wanted to meet $male:him,female:her$ in person. I guess I just got excited.

0805235907007127-SoulBinder-.name: Not many people know this, but there's a sect of animal people who live in the mountains and practice mysterious martial arts. I've heard legends that they can even bring the dead back to life...

0629000607006437-Striker-.name: You need anything, you just call out my name. Not that I'll come running, but maybe it'll give you good luck.

0629000607006438-Striker-.name: This isn't any ordinary warehouse. That much is obvious.

0629000607006439-Striker-.name: The boss wouldn't have trusted me with this job if I weren't important.

0629000607006440-Striker-.name: Do you know why I'm called $npcName:11001545[gender:0]$?

0629000607006443-Striker-.name: I'm so great I deserve a standing ovation! Haw! I can't believe you never heard of me. Well, remember me for next time.

0629000607006444-Striker-.name: What, you come here to stare at me? Unless you have something else to say, scram!

0629000607006445-Striker-.name: You probably already heard this, but listen anyway. They call me Bravos 'cause I'm so great I deserve a standing ovation! Get it?

0629000607006446-Striker-.name: What, you come here to stare at me? Unless you have something else to say, scram!

0706165507006636-Striker-.name: Yeah, what do you want to talk about?

0706165507006637-Striker-.name: What's your standing in Blackstar, exactly?

0706165507006638-Striker-.name: Isn't it obvious? There's a reason I'm always picked for the best missions. The boss trusts me. I'll be an officer in no time, and then idiots like $npcName:11001686[gender:0]$ will have to do whatever I say.

0629000607006447-Striker-.name: You need anything, you just call out my name. Not that I'll come running, but maybe it'll give you good luck.

0629000607006448-Striker-.name: Gah... I shouldn't have let my guard down...

0629000607006449-Striker-.name: Got to keep my eyes open.

0629000607006450-Striker-.name: Do you know why I'm called $npcName:11001545[gender:0]$?

0629000607006451-Striker-.name: You want to ask me that? Right now?

0629000607006454-Striker-.name: Wh-what? You worried about me? Don't! Look... You're giving me goosebumps!

0629000607006456-Striker-.name:
What's with the intense stare? Spit it out or sc-scram!
<font color="#909090">(He's blushing.)</font>

0629000607006457-Striker-.name: You need anything, you just call out my name. Not that I'll come running, but maybe it'll give you good luck.

0629000607006458-Striker-.name: What's this information the boss wants?

0629000607006460-Striker-.name: Hm... Did I ever tell you why they call me $npcName:11001680[gender:0]$? I'm sure I told someone, but I can't remember if it was you.

0629000607006461-Striker-.name: Why do you keep asking that question?

0629000607006463-Striker-.name: You got a problem with that? I'm my own man, and if I want to ask the same question over and over again, you can't stop me. Just for that, I'll tell you again!

0629000607006465-Striker-.name: They call me Bravos 'cause I'm so great I deserve a standing ovation! I hope you remember this time, 'cause there will be a test!

0629000607006466-Striker-.name: What, you come here to stare at me? Unless you have something else to say, scram!

0706165507006640-Striker-.name: Yeah, what do you want to talk about?

0706165507006641-Striker-.name: What was that clone in the video?

0706165507006642-Striker-.name: Beats me. I never saw it before. This is a messed up thought, but could you imagine having 100 $npcNamePlural:11001688[gender:0]$ running around? Ugh, just having one of him is too much.

0629000607006467-Striker-.name: You need anything, you just call out my name. Not that I'll come running, but maybe it'll give you good luck.

0629000607006468-Striker-.name: What're you staring at? You want a piece of me?

0629000607006469-Striker-.name: Who's this $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ guy I keep hearing about? Local cage fighter or something?

0629000607006470-Striker-.name: If Ereve'd just thrown her party like a good little empress, I wouldn't have to be here now...

0629000607006471-Striker-.name: You got something to stay, or you just gonna stand there and stare all night? Actually, I don't care. Get outta here.

0708220807006669-Striker-.name: What do you know about the $map:52000034$?

0708220807006670-Striker-.name: What happened to the vagrants Blackstar took hostage?

0708220807006671-Striker-.name: What do you want to hear? Tales of my exploits? The names of punks I beat to a bloody pulp?

0708220807006672-Striker-.name: How did you get the name "Zabeth?"

0708220807006673-Striker-.name: Wh-why do you want to know? Did $npcName:11001674[gender:0]$ put you up to this?

0708220807006674-Striker-.name: Ahem! Don't listen to that fool. My name is Eliza—

0708220807006675-Striker-.name: I-I mean, it's $npcName:11001682[gender:0]$! Just $npcName:11001682[gender:0]$, got it?!

0708220807006677-Striker-.name: Quit it with the stupid questions! It's none of your business!

0708220807006678-Striker-.name: Is that what this place's called? I didn't know that. I don't care, neither. I just want to get back to base. I belong at $map:63000020$, watching over the fighters. This town doesn't hold a candle to the excitement of the ring.

0706173707006644-Striker-.name: That place before... You could feel the fighting spirit in the air! This place, on the other hand... Words don't do it justice.

0708220807006679-Striker-.name: I got no idea who you're talking about. Ask $npcName:11001674[gender:0]$. Now, the one I'm interested in... is you. They say you're the Gray Wolf. I don't buy it, 'cause why would the Gray Wolf work with the boss? Gray Wolf or not, you could fight your way to the top of Blackstar if you wanted.

0708220807006680-Striker-.name: My code of honor wouldn't allow that.

0708220807006681-Striker-.name: Code of honor! That's rich. Sounds like you're too much of a coward to take on Blackstar. Can't blame you, though. I wouldn't want to fight me, neither.

0708220807006683-Striker-.name: Uh...! D-did you hear that? M-my stomach's calling. I better go home and... and turn it off...

0712221207006735-Striker-.name: Yeah? What do you want to know?

0712221207006736-Striker-.name: I want to know about $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$'s fighting style.

0712221207006737-Striker-.name: What're you asking me for? You're the one who faced him in the ring! I told you he'd take you out with a single punch, didn't I? Ha!

0712221207006739-Striker-.name: Trying to figure out how he got so strong, eh? I think he was just born strong. I hear he never slacks off on his training, but no amount of training makes you as tough as he is.

0712221207006740-Striker-.name: He's got a 30-step routine he goes through every single day. Enough to give a normal man a heart attack, they say. Some of the other lunks in the organization tried it, and they all passed out foaming at the mouth.

0712221207006742-Striker-.name: It's nothing special, really. 4,000 knuckle push-ups, 1,000 finger push-ups, 5,000 sit-ups, 5,000 squats, 200 laps around the track... That sort of thing.

0712221207006743-Striker-.name: He uses sandbags and chunks of meat as punching bags, and he lets others whale on him to toughen him up. There's no secret to his training. He's just that tough.

0629000607006476-Striker-.name: What're you staring at? You want a piece of me?

0629000607006484-Striker-.name: What're you staring at? You want a piece of me?

0629000607006485-Striker-.name: There's something off about this place. It doesn't smell right.

0629000607006487-Striker-.name: You need something, go bother $npcName:11001545[gender:0]$ instead. He likes to hear himself talk, and I got real work to do.

0706173707006646-Striker-.name: I'm a henchman, plain and simple. $npcName:11001678[gender:0]$ has big ideas about moving up in the organization, but I don't care what they call me as long as I get to bash heads in.

0706173707006647-Striker-.name: Boss. Lackey. It doesn't matter. All that matters is how strong you are. $npcName:11001678[gender:0]$ can try to rise as much as he wants, but he's got a glass jaw. A weakling like him just ain't officer material.

0629000607006488-Striker-.name: What're you staring at? You want a piece of me?

0629000607006489-Striker-.name: If he shows up, I'll knock his block off.

0629000607006491-Striker-.name: Whatever you want from me, it can wait.

0706173707006649-Striker-.name: Wh-who's worried? Stop talking nonsense, or I'll beat the stuffing outta you!

0629000607006492-Striker-.name: What're you staring at? You want a piece of me?

0629000607006493-Striker-.name: This place gives me the creeps.

0629000607006494-Striker-.name: Crud. I shoulda gone before we came here.

0629000607006495-Striker-.name: You need something, go bother $npcName:11001545[gender:0]$ instead. He likes to hear himself talk, and I got real work to do.

0706173707006650-Striker-.name: What was that clone in the video?

0706173707006651-Striker-.name: I don't know if it was a clone or just someone who really looks like $npcName:11001680[gender:0]$. And I don't want to know. Now stop making me think about it.

0629000607006496-Striker-.name: What're you staring at? You want a piece of me?

0629000607006497-Striker-.name: The sooner we get out of this dusty hole, the better.

0629000607006498-Striker-.name: Sigh... I'm sure the boss thought it was very funny, pairing these two together.

0630002107006511-Striker-.name: Just when I think these two are unbelievable, they do something to one up themselves.

0708220807006684-Striker-.name: Was there something you wanted to ask me?

0708220807006685-Striker-.name: What do you make of my arrangement with $npcName:11001629[gender:0]$?

0708220807006686-Striker-.name: What happened to the vagrants Blackstar took hostage?

0708220807006687-Striker-.name: To be honest, I don't know why that man—I mean, the boss—keeps you around. The things he's asked you to do...

0708220807006689-Striker-.name: Yes. Easily. And you don't even like him. So why does he have you do it?

0708220807006690-Striker-.name: I think I know the answer to that.

0708220807006693-Striker-.name: Maybe, but can you be tamed? My peers may think you're harmless, but I see a wolf that's taken care to hide $male:his,female:her$ fangs and claws.

0708220807006694-Striker-.name: If you're worried about their safety, well, that all depends on your cooperation.

0708220807006695-Striker-.name: I don't understand why you allow the boss to walk all over you. You have no obligation to him. Blackstar is big, but you...

0708220807006696-Striker-.name: I lost the match. I'm honor bound to work with him.

0708220807006697-Striker-.name: You say that, even knowing that the fight was fixed? Incredible. You're the most loyal, honorable, and... frustratingly righteous person I've ever met.

0708225907006706-Striker-.name: I've learned a new lesson from $npcName:11001629[gender:0]$.

0629000607006499-Striker-.name: If that's what you think, then I won't ask any further.

0630002207006511-Striker-.name: If you need anything, you can try asking $npcName:11001674[gender:0]$ or $npcName:11001682[gender:0]$. I can't guarantee that they'll be very helpful, though.

0712221207006746-Striker-.name: $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ is truly a magnificent beast. It's not just that he's strong—he is completely and utterly fearless.

0712221207006747-Striker-.name: What does he have to fear? His dad is the boss!

0712221207006748-Striker-.name: Of course you would assume that $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ gets special treatment because of his father. But, in truth, it's $npcName:11001618[gender:0]$ who is lucky to have $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ for a son.

0712221207006749-Striker-.name: When Blackstar was first started, it had many enemies. Hardly a day passed when someone didn't try to take the boss's life. But $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ watched over $map:02000100$ like a hawk, keeping his father safe and eliminating our enemies one at a time.

0712221207006750-Striker-.name: He won't take credit for it, but there would be no Blackstar without him. And yet, some people still grumble that he acts too cocky for a brat who merely happened to be adopted by the boss.

0712221207006752-Striker-.name: I don't know the details. All I know is that the boss brought home this ten-year-old boy one day and treated him as a son. He couldn't possibly be the boss's real child.

0712221207006753-Striker-.name: Whatever their story is, $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ doesn't seem to care about his birth or his position in Blackstar. Most of us respect and admire him, and those who don't are too cowardly to speak up.
